analyzed: e o nama vaṇṇe

analyzed: ve vā

original: Tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Dukkataṃ=dukkaṭaṃ, evaṃ sukaṭaṃ, patthaṭo,

original: pataṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo. Aṭṭhakathā. Paṇidhānaṃ, paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato,
analyzed: pataṭaḥ uddhaṭaḥ visaṭaḥ aṭṭhakathā paṇidhānam paṇipātaḥ paṇāmaḥ paṇītam pariṇataḥ

original: pariṇāmo, duṇṇayo, niṇṇayo, oṇato. Paripanno=palipanno, evaṃ palibodho, pallaṅkaṃ,
analyzed: pariṇāmaḥ duṇṇayaḥ niṇṇayaḥ oṇataḥ paripanna upalipanno evam palibodho pallaṅkam

original: taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo. (Byañjanasandhi).
analyzed: talunaḥ mahāsālaḥ mālutaḥ sukhumālaḥ byañjana sandhi

original: Cakkhu udapādi, akkhi rujati, purima jāti, aṇu thūlāni, kattabba kusalaṃ bahuṃ, ta sampayuttā, tata sabhāvato itī+dha “ve”ti vattate yāva “mayadā sare”ti.
analyzed: cakkhu udapādi akkhi rujati purima jāti aṇu thūlāni kattabba kusalam bahum ta sampayuttā tata sabhāvataḥ iti idha vā iti vattate yāva mayadā sara iti

original: 38. Niggahītaṃ
analyzed: niggahītam

original: Niggahītāgamo hoti vā kvaci. Sāmatthiyenā+gamova, sa ca rassasarasseva hoti… tassa
analyzed: niggahīta āgamaḥ hoti vā kvaci sa ca hoti tassa

original: rassasarānugatattā. Ṭhānīna+māliṅghiya gacchati pavattatīti āgamo. Cakkhuṃ udapādi,
analyzed: rassa sara anugata ttā ṭhānīnam āliṅghiya gacchati pavattati iti āgamo cakkhum udapādi

original: akkhiṃ rujati, purimaṃ jāti, aṇuṃ thūlāni, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ, taṃsampayuttā,
analyzed: akkhim rujati purimam jāti aṇum thūlāni kattabbam kusalam bahum tad sampayuttā

original: taṃtaṃsabhāvato. Vāggahaṇena cakkhu udapādi iccādi. Avaṃsiro, yāvañcidaṃtiādi niccaṃ…
analyzed: taṃ taṃsa bhāvataḥ vāc gahaṇena cakkhu udapādi icca ādi avaṃsiraḥ yāvañcid aṃti ādi niccam

original: vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa, vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassā+nurodhena lakkhaṇe pavattitā
analyzed: vavatthita vibhāsa ttā vā adhikārassa vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassa anurodhena lakkhaṇe pavatti tā

original: vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā. Vāsaddo hi atthadvaye vattate katthaci vikappe, katthaci
analyzed: vibhāsāḥ vavatthitavibhāsāḥ vā saddaḥ hi attha dvaye vattate katthaci vikappe katthaci

original: yathāvavatthitarūpapariggaheti. Yadā pacchime, tadā nicca+manicca+masantañca vidhiṃ
analyzed: yathāvavatthita rūpa pariggahā iti yadā pacchime tadā niccam aniccam asantam ca vidhim

original: dīpeti. Ettha pana kvacisaddassā+nuvattanā tenevā+santavidhi siddhoti vāsaddeni+taradvayaṃ.
analyzed: dīpa iti ettha pana siddhaḥ ti

original: Kvaci tveva, na hi etehi, idha ceva.
analyzed: kvaci tu eva na hi ca iva

original: Saṃ rambho, saṃ ratto, saṃ rāgo, tāsaṃ ahaṃ santike, evaṃ ayaṃ, puṃ liṅgaṃ, kiṃ ahaṃ, tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itī+dha “niggahītā”dhikāro ā “mayadā sare”ti.
analyzed: sam rambho sam ratto sam rāgo tāsam aham santike evam ayam pum liṅgam kim aham tassa adāsim aham iti idha niggahīta adhikāraḥ ā mayadā sara iti

original: 39. Lopo
analyzed: lopaḥ

original: Niggahītassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Dīghe sārambho saṃrambho, sāratto saṃratto, sārāgo
analyzed: niggahītassa lopaḥ hoti vā kvaci dīghe sārambhaḥ saṃrambhaḥ sāratto saṃratto sārāgo

original: saṃrāgo, pubbassaralope tāsāhaṃ santike, evāyaṃ, dvitte pulliṅgaṃ puṃliṅgaṃ, kyāhaṃ,
analyzed: saṃrāgaḥ pubbassara lope tāsāham santike eva ayam dvitte put liṅgam pum liṅgam kyā aham

original: tassa adāsahaṃ. Paṭisallāno, sallekho, pātukāmo, gantumano, ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ,
analyzed: tassa adāsaham paṭisallāno sallekho pātu kāmaḥ gantu manaḥ dassanam

original: etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ, avisāhāro, cirappavāsintiādīsu niccaṃ. Kvacīti kiṃ, eva+mayaṃ,
analyzed: etam sāsanam cirappavāsin ti ādīsu niccam kvaci iti kim evam ayam

original: ki+mahaṃ, etaṃ maṅgala+muttamaṃ.
analyzed: kim aham etam maṅgalam uttamam

original: Kataṃ iti, abhinanduṃ iti, uttattaṃ iva, cakkaṃ iva, kaliṃiva, halaṃ idāni, kiṃ idāni, tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api, uttariṃ api, dātuṃ api, sadisaṃ eva itī+dha –
analyzed: katam iti abhinandum iti uttattam iva cakkam iva kalim iva halam idāni kim idāni tvam asi idam api uttarim api dātum api sadisam eva iti idha

original: 40. Parasarassa
analyzed: para sarassa

original: Niggahītamhā parasarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Katanti, abhinandunti, uttattaṃva, cakkaṃva,
analyzed: niggahītamhā para sarassa lopaḥ hoti vā kvaci abhinandunti

original: kaliṃva, halaṃdāni, kiṃdāni, tvaṃsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṃva. Vāti
analyzed: halaṃdāni kiṃdāni tvaṃsi idampi uttarimpi dātumpi sadisaṃva vāti

original: kiṃ, kataṃiti, kimiti, dātumapi, sadisaṃ eva.
analyzed: kim katam iti kim iti dātum api sadisam eva

original: Pupphaṃ assā uppajjati, evaṃ assa te āsavā itī+dha parassaralope –
analyzed: puppham assā uppajjati evam assa te āsavāḥ iti idha parassara lope

original: 53. Saṃyogādilopo
analyzed: saṃyoga ādi lopaḥ

original: Abyavahitānaṃ dvinnaṃ byañjanānaṃ ekatra ṭhiti saṃyogo, tasmiṃ saṃyoge yo ādibhūtāvayavo,
analyzed: ekatra saṃyogaḥ tasmin saṃyoge yaḥ ādi bhūta avayavaḥ

original: tassa vā kvaci lopo hotītiādibyañjanassa lopo. Pupphaṃsā uppajjati, evaṃsa te āsavā.
analyzed: tassa vā kvaci lopaḥ hoti iti ādi byañjanassa lopo uppajjati evam te āsavā

original: Tiṇṇaṃ saṃyogānaṃ visaye agyāgāraṃ, vutyassa iti hoti.
analyzed: tiṇṇam saṃyogānam visaye agya āgāram vutyassa iti hoti

original: Taṃ karoti, taṃ khaṇaṃ, saṃ gato, taṃ ghataṃ, dhammaṃ care, taṃ channaṃ, taṃ jātaṃ,
analyzed: tam karoti tam khaṇam sam gataḥ tam ghatam dhammam care tam channam tam jātam

original: taṃ jhānaṃ, taṃ ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ ḍahati, taṃ tanoti, taṃ thiraṃ, taṃ dānaṃ,
analyzed: tam jhānam tam ñāṇam tam ṭhānam tam ḍahati tam tanoti tam thiram tam dānam

original: taṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ niccutaṃ, taṃ patto, taṃ phalaṃ, tesaṃ bodho, saṃ bhūto, taṃ mittaṃ,
analyzed: tam dhanam tam niccutam tam patto tam phalam tesam bodhaḥ sam bhūtaḥ tam mittam

original: kiṃ kato, dātuṃ gato itī+dha –
analyzed: kim kataḥ dātum gataḥ iti idha

original: 41. Vagge vagganto
analyzed: vagge vagga antaḥ

original: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hotīti nimittānussarānaṃ paccāsatyā tabbaggapañcamo
analyzed: niggahītassa kho vagge vagga antaḥ vā hoti iti nimitta anussarānam paccāsatyā tad bagga pañcamaḥ

original: hoti. Paccāsatti nāma ṭhānato āsannatā guṇato vā, guṇatoti vaṇṇasaññādiguṇato. Niggahītassa
analyzed: hoti paccāsatti nāma ṭhānataḥ āsanna tā guṇataḥ vā guṇato ti vaṇṇa saññā ādi guṇataḥ niggahītassa

original: anusarīyatīti pacchā katvā sarīyatīti anussarotipi vuccati. Taṅkaroti=taṃ karoti,
analyzed: anusarīyati iti pacchā katvā sarīyati iti vuccati taṅkaroti tam karoti

original: evaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ, saṅgato, taṅghataṃ. Dhammañcare, tañchannaṃ, tañjātaṃ, tañjhānaṃ,
analyzed: evam taṅkhaṇam saṅgataḥ taṅghatam dhammañcare tat channam tat jātam tat jhānam

original: taññāṇaṃ. Taṇṭhānaṃ, taṇḍahati. Tantanoti, tanthiraṃ, tandānaṃ, tandhanaṃ, tanniccutaṃ,
analyzed: tad nāṇam tad ṭhānam taṇḍahati tantanoti tanthiram tandānam tandhanam tad niccutam

original: tampatto, tamphalaṃ, tesammodho, sambhūto, tammittaṃ. Kiṅkato, dātuṅgato, taṇhaṅkaro,
analyzed: tampattaḥ tamphalam sambhūtaḥ tammittam kiṅkataḥ dātuṅgataḥ taṇhaṅkaro

original: raṇañjaho, saṇṭhito, jutindharo, sammatotiādīsu niccaṃ.
analyzed: raṇañjahaḥ saṇṭhitaḥ jutindharaḥ sammataḥ ti ādīsu niccam

original: Ānantarikaṃ ya+māhu, yaṃ yadeva, paccattaṃ eva, taṃ hiitī+dha –
analyzed: ānantarikam yam āhu yam yat eva paccattam eva tam hi iti idha

original: 42. Yevahisu ño
analyzed: ye va hi su ñaḥ

original: Ya+eva+hisaddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti. “Vaggalasehi te”ti yassa ñakāro. Ānantarikañña+māhu=ānantarikaṃ
analyzed: ya eva hi saddesu niggahītassa vā ñaḥ hoti vagga lasehi ta iti yassa ñakāraḥ

original: ya+māhu, yaññadeva=yaṃyadeva, ñassa dvitte paccattaññeva, paccattaṃ eva, tañhi, tañhi.
analyzed: yam āhu ñassa dvitte paccattaṃ eva paccattam eva tañhi tañhi

original: “Abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate”ti ñāyā evasaddasahacariyā “ya” iti sabbādiyasaddasseva gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate iti ñāyāḥ eva sadda sahacariyā yaḥ iti sabba ādiya saddassa iva gahaṇam

original: Saṃyogo, saṃyojanaṃ, saṃyato, saṃyācikāya itī+dha –
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ saṃyojanam saṃyataḥ saṃyācikāyaḥ iti idha

original: 43. Ye saṃssa
analyzed: ye saṃssa

original: Saṃsaddassa yaṃ niggahītaṃ, tassa vā ño hoti yakāre. Saññogo=saṃyogo, evaṃ saṃyojanaṃ,
analyzed: saṃsaddassa yam niggahītam tassa vā ñaḥ hoti yakāre evam saṃyojanam

original: saññato, saññācikāya. Idha yakāramattova gayhate. Saṃssāti kiṃ, etaṃ yojanaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: saññataḥ saññācikāya idha yakāra mattaḥ uva gayhate saṃssāti kim etam yojanam tam

original: yānaṃ, taṃ saraṇaṃ yanti.
analyzed: yānam tam saraṇam yanti

original: Taṃ eva, taṃ ahaṃ brūmi, yaṃ āhu, dhanaṃ eva, kiṃ etaṃ, nindituṃ arahati, taṃ idaṃ, yaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ anattā, etaṃ avoca, etaṃ eva itī+dha –
analyzed: tam eva tam aham brūmi yam āhu dhanam eva kim etam ninditum arahati tam idam yam aniccam tam anattā etam avocaḥ etam eva iti idha

original: 44. Mayadā sare
analyzed: mayadā sare

original: Niggahītassa ma ya dā honti vā sare kvaci. Tameva taṃ eva, tamahaṃ brūmi=taṃ ahaṃ
analyzed: niggahītassa honti vā sare kvaci tam eva tam eva tam aham brūmi tam aham

original: brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṃ, ninditumarahati. Tayidaṃ. Yadaniccaṃ, tadanattā,
analyzed: brūmi yam āhuḥ dhanam eva kim etam ninditum arahati tayā idam yat aniccam tat anattā

original: etadavoca, etadeva. “Mayadā”ti yogavibhāgā buddhama saraṇama iccādi bhavati.
analyzed: etat avocaḥ etat eva yogavibhāgāḥ iccādi bhavati

original: 47. Tadaminādīni
analyzed: tad ami nādīni

original: Tadaminādīni nippajjanti. “Ya+dalakkhaṇikaṃ, taṃ nipātanā”ti ñāyā lakkhaṇantarena
analyzed: tad aminā ādīni nippajjanti yat alakkhaṇikam tam ñāyā lakkhaṇa antarena

original: avihitā desa+lopā+gama+vipallāsā, sabbattha imināva daṭṭhabbā. Idañca paresaṃ pisodarādimiva
analyzed: avihitā desa lopa āgama vipallāsā sabbattha iminā ava daṭṭhabbā idam ca paresam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Phusitaṃ=jalabindu, phusita+mudara+massa pisodaraṃ. Issa akāre taṃ iminā=tadaminā,
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam phusitam jala bindu phusitam udaram assa pisā udaram akāre tam akāre tam

original: sakiṃ āgāmī=sakadāgāmī, dhassa dakāre ekaṃ idha ahaṃ=eka+midā+haṃ, vidhassa vidādeso
analyzed: sakim āgāmī sakadāgāmī dhassa dakāre ekam idha aham ekam ida aham vidhassa vid ādesaḥ

original: saṃvidhāya avahāro=saṃvidāvahāro, vārisaddassa vakāre, hassa lakāre ca kate vārivāhako=valāhako,
analyzed: saṃvidhāya avahāraḥ saṃvidāvahāraḥ vāri saddassa vakāre hassa lakāre ca kate vārivāhakovalāhako

original: jīvanassa jīādeso, jīvanassa muto=jīmūto. Chavassa suādese, sayanassa sānādese ca
analyzed: jīvanassa jī ādesaḥ jīvanassa mutaḥ jīmūtaḥ chavassa su ādese sayanassa sāna ādese ca

original: kate chavassa sayanaṃ=susānaṃ. Uddhassa uduādese, khassa khalaādese ca “saramhā dve”ti
analyzed: kate chavassa sayanaṃsusānam uddhassa udu ādese khassa khala ādese ca saramhā dve iti

original: dvittādimhi ca kate uddhaṃ khaṃ assa udukkhalaṃ. Pisitassa piādese, asassa sācādese
analyzed: dvi tta ādimhi ca kate uddham kham assa udukkhalam pi sitassa pi ādese asassa sāca ādese

original: ca kate pisitāso=pisāco.
analyzed: ca kate pisitāsopisācaḥ

original: Mahīsaddassa mayūādese, ravatissa rādese ca kate mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro. Eva+maññepi payogato+nugantabbā. Ettha ca –
analyzed: mahī saddassa mayū ādese ravatissa ra ādese ca kate mahiyam ravati iti mayūraḥ evam aññe pi payogataḥ nugantabbā ettha ca

original: Vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyāyo,
analyzed: vaṇṇa āgamaḥ vaṇṇa vipariyāyaḥ

original: Dve cā+pare vaṇṇavikāra+nāsā;
analyzed: dve ca apare vaṇṇa vikāra nāsā

original: Dhātussa atthātisayena yogo,
analyzed: dhātussa attha atisayena yogaḥ

original: Ta+duccate pañcavidhaṃ niruttaṃti.
analyzed: pañcavidham

original: Yathā dvāre niyutto=dovārikoti okaāgamo. Hiṃsasaddassa sīhoti vipallāso. Nijako=niyakoti
analyzed: yathā dvāre niyuttaḥ dovārikaḥ ti oka āgamaḥ hiṃsa saddassa sīhaḥ iti vipallāsaḥ nijako niyako ti

original: vikāro. Mehanassa khassa mālā mekhalāti vaṇṇalopo, ha+na+makārānaṃ lopo. Mayūroti
analyzed: vikāraḥ mehanassa khassa mālā mekhalā ati vaṇṇa lopaḥ hana makārānam lopaḥ mayūraḥ ti

original: atthe ravatissa atissayayogoti.
analyzed: atthe ra va tissa a ti saya yogaḥ ti

original: Yathariva tathariveti nipātāva. “Jaraggavā vicintesuṃ, vara+mhākaṃ bhusāmive”ti ettha ivasaddo evakārattho. Niggahītasandhi.
analyzed: yathariva tathariva iti nipātāva jaraggavāḥ vicintesum vara mhākam bhusām iva iti ettha iva saddo evakāra atthaḥ niggahīta sandhi

original: Sandhissarānaṃ paṭisedhasandhi,
analyzed: paṭisedha sandhi

original: Atho byañjana+sarabyañjanānaṃ;
analyzed: atha u byañjana sara byañjana anam

original: Sandhi ca+tho niggahītassa sandhi,
analyzed: sandhi catho niggahītassa sandhi

original: Bhavanti sandhi pana pañcadhā ve.
analyzed: bhavanti sandhi pana pañcadhā ve

original: Iti payogasiddhiyaṃ sandhikaṇḍo paṭhamo.
analyzed: iti sandhi kaṇḍaḥ paṭhamaḥ

original: 2. Nāmakaṇḍa
analyzed: nāmakaṇḍa

original: Atha nāmāni vuccante. Taṃ atthābhimukhaṃ namanato, attanā ca+tthassa nāmanato nāmaṃ,
analyzed: atha nāmāni vuccante tam attha abhimukham namanataḥ attanā catthassa nāmanataḥ nāmam

original: dabbābhidhānaṃ. Taṃ duvidhaṃ saliṅgā+liṅgato, anvattharuḷhito ca, tividhaṃ pumi+tthi+napuṃsakaliṅgato,
analyzed: dabba abhidhānam tam duvidham sa liṅga aliṅgataḥ anvattha ruḷhitaḥ ca tividham pum itthi napuṃsaka liṅgato

original: rukkho, latā, vananti. Catubbidhaṃ sāmañña+guṇa+kriyā+yadicchānāmato, rukkho, nīlo,
analyzed: rukkhaḥ latāḥ vananti catubbidham sāmañña guṇa kriyā yad icchā nāmataḥ rukkhaḥ nīlaḥ

original: pācako, sirivaḍḍhoti. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ avaṇṇi+vaṇṇu+vaṇṇo+kāra+niggahītantapakatibhedato,
analyzed: pācako sirivaḍḍhaḥ ti aṭṭhavidham

original: ettha kiṃsaddo niggahītanto. Paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati, saddo, dhātu ca.
analyzed: ettha kiṃsaddaḥ paccayā paṭhamam karīyati iti dhātu ca

original: Tattha saliṅgesu tāva akārantato pulliṅgā sugatasaddā satta vibhattiyo parā yojīyante. Sugataiti ṭhite –
analyzed: tattha sa liṅgesu tāva akāra antatas pulliṅgā sugata saddā satta vibhattiyaḥ parāḥ sugata eti ṭhite

original: 1. Dve dve+kānekesu nāmasmā siyo aṃyo nā hi sa naṃ smā hi sa naṃ smiṃ su
analyzed: dve dveka anekesu siyaḥ hi sa nam hi sa nam smin su

original: Etesaṃ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā yathākkamaṃ. Yato ime satta
analyzed: etesam dve dve honti eka aneka atthesu vattamānataḥ nāmasmai yathākkamam yatas ime satta

original: dukā honti, “atthavanta+madhātuka+mapaccayaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ kitaka+taddhita+samāsā ce”ti
analyzed: dukāḥ honti atthavantam adhātukam apaccayam pāṭipadikam kitaka taddhita samāsā ca iti

original: vuttattā taṃ nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ nāma. Keci sakattha+dabba+liṅga+saṅkhyā+kammādipañcakaṃ
analyzed: vutta ttā tam nāmam pāṭipadikam nāma keci sa kattha dabba liṅga saṅkhyā kamma ādi pañcakam

original: pāṭipadikanti vadanti. Tene+taṃ vuccati –
analyzed: pāṭipadikam ti vadanti tena itam vuccati

original: Sakattha+dabba+liṅgāni, saddattha+mabravuṃ pare;
analyzed: sa kattha dap ba liṅgāni pare

original: Saṅkhyā+kammādikānantu, vibhatti vācakā matā.
analyzed: vācakā matā

original: Sakattha+dabba+liṅgāni, saṅkhyā+kammādipañcakaṃ;
analyzed: sa kattha dabba liṅgāni saṅkhyā kamma ādi pañcakam

original: Saddattha+mabravuṃ keci, vibhatti pana jotakāti ca.
analyzed: keci ca

original: Tato ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṃ bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanañcāti aniyamena pasaṅge “nāmasmā”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: tatas ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanam bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanam ca ati aniyamena pasaṅge adhikāro

original: Dhātunāyutte “tassa nappaṭibhātī”ti chaṭṭhī.
analyzed: dhātunā ayutte tassa na paṭibhāti iti chaṭṭhī

original: 3. Kāladdhāna+maccantasaṃyoge
analyzed: kāla d dhāna mac canta saṃyoge

analyzed: māsam maṃsodanam saradam ramaṇīyā nadī sabbakālam ramaṇīyam

original: Pubbanhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājānoti
analyzed: pubbanha samayam nivāsetvā ekam samayam bhagavā imam rattim cattāraḥ mahā rājāno ti

original: evamādīsu kālavācīhi accantasaṃyoge dutiyā, bahulaṃvidhānā vibhattivipallāso vā.

original: Māsenā+nuvāko+dhīto, kosenā+nuvāko+dhītoti karaṇatthe tatiyā.
analyzed: māsena anuvākaḥ udhītaḥ kosena anuvākaḥ udhītaḥ iti karaṇa atthe tatiyā

original: 4. Gatibodhāhārasaddatthākammakabhajjādīnaṃ payojje
analyzed: gati bodha āhāra saddattha a kammaka bhajja ādīnam payojje

original: Gatyatthānaṃ bodhatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthāna+makammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca payojje
analyzed: gatyatthānam bodha tthānam āhāra tthānam sadda tthānam akammakānam bhajja ādīnam ca payojje

original: kattari dutiyā hoti. Datto gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, yāpayati vā. Guru bodhayati
analyzed: kattari dutiyā hoti dattaḥ gamayati māṇavakam gāmam yāpayati vā guru bodhayati

analyzed: māṇavakam dhammam vedayati vā mātā bhojayati puttam odanam āsayati vā guru ajjhāpayati

original: sissaṃ vedaṃ, pāṭhayati vā. Payojjato+ññatra kamme dutiyā. Poso āsayati dattaṃ, sāyayati
analyzed: sissam vedam pāṭhayati vā payojjatā uññatra kamme dutiyā posaḥ āsayati dattam sāyayati

original: vā. Poso aññaṃ bhajjāpeti, aññaṃ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṃ santharāpeti.
analyzed: vā posaḥ aññam bhajjāpeti aññam koṭṭāpeti aññam santharāpeti

original: 5. Harādīnaṃ vā
analyzed: hara ādīnam vā

original: Harādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Poso hāreti bhāraṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā.
analyzed: hara ādīnam payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā posaḥ hāra iti bhāram dattam dattena iti vā

original: Dassayate janaṃ rājā, janeneti vā. Abhivādayate guruṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Ajjhohāreti
analyzed: dassayate janam rājā janena iti vā abhivādayate gurum dattam dattena iti vā ajjhohāreti

original: sattuṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Kāreti datto dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Pakkhe sabbatra kattari tatiyā.
analyzed: sattum dattam dattena iti vā kāreti dattaḥ dattam dattena iti vā pakkhe sabbatra kattari tatiyā

original: 6. Na khādādīnaṃ
analyzed: na khāda ādīnam

original: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti. Gatyatthādīsu kvaci paṭisedhattha+midaṃ.
analyzed: khāda ādīnam payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti gati attha ādīsu kvaci paṭisedha attham idam

original: Khādayati datto dattena, ādayati dattena, avhāpayati datthena, saddāyayati dattena,
analyzed: khādayati dattaḥ dattena ādayati dattena avhāpayati datthena saddāyayati dattena

original: nāyayati dattena, kandayati dattena.
analyzed: nāyayati dattena kandayati dattena

original: 7. Jhādīhi yuttā
analyzed: jha ādīhi yuttā

original: Dhiādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhi+ratthu+maṃ putikāyaṃ, antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā
analyzed: dhi ādīhi dutiyā hoti dhiratthumam putikāyam antarā ca rājagaham antarā

original: ca nālandaṃ, rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivarabhūte majjheti attho. Samādhāna+mantarena,
analyzed: ca nālandam rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivara bhūte majjhe iti attho samādhānam antarena

original: mucalinda+mabhito saraṃ. Chaṭṭhyatthe+yaṃ dutiyā.
analyzed: mucalindam abhitas saram chaṭṭhī atthā iyam dutiyā

original: 8. Lakkhaṇitthambhūtavicchāsva+bhinā
Lakkhaṇādīsva+tthesu abhinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkha+mabhivijjotate cando, ettha
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādīsu atthesu abhinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti rukkham abhivijjotate candaḥ ettha

original: rukkho lakkhaṇaṃ, cando lakkhitabbo, tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā pakāsīyatīti
analyzed: rukkhaḥ lakkhaṇam candaḥ lakkhitabbaḥ tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇa vutti tā pakāsīyati iti

original: rukkho abhinā yutto nāma. Sādhu devadatto mātara+mabhi, mātari sādhuttaṃ pattotyattho.
analyzed: rukkhaḥ abhinā yuttaḥ nāma sādhu devadattaḥ mātaram abhi mātari

original: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃabhi vijjotate cando, rukkhe rukkhetyattho.
analyzed: rukkham rukkham abhi vijjotate candaḥ

original: 9. Patiparīhi bhāge ca
analyzed: pati parīhi bhāge ca

original: Patiparīhi yuttato lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge ca+tthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṃpati vijjotate,
analyzed: pati parīhi yuttataḥ lakkhaṇa ādīsu bhāge catthe dutiyā hoti rukkhaṃpati vijjotate

original: sādhu devadatto mātaraṃpati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃpati tiṭṭhati, ya+dettha maṃ pati siyā,
analyzed: sādhu devadattaḥ mātaraṃpati rukkham rukkhaṃpati tiṭṭhati yat ettha mama pati siyā

original: yo mama bhāgo, so dīyatutyattho. Evaṃ rukkhaṃparityādipi.
analyzed: yaḥ mama bhāgaḥ saḥ evam

original: 10. Anunāti
analyzed: anunāti

original: Lakkhaṇādīsu dutiyā. Rukkhamanu vijjotate, saccakiriya+manu vassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātara+manu, rukkhaṃ rukkha+manu vijjotate, yadettha maṃanu siyā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādīsu dutiyā rukkham anu vijjotate sacca kiriyam anu vassi hetu ca lakkhaṇam bhavati sādhu devadattaḥ mātaram anu rukkham rukkham anu vijjotate yat ettha mam anu siyā

original: 11. Sahatthe
analyzed: sahatthe

original: Sahatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Pabbata+manu tiṭṭhati, pabbatena saha tyattho.
analyzed: saha atthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā pabbatam anu tiṭṭhati pabbatena saha

original: 12. Hīne
analyzed: hīne

original: Hīnatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Anusāriputtaṃ paññavanto bhikkhū, sāriputtato paññāya hīnātyattho.
analyzed: hīna atthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā anu sāriputtam paññavantaḥ bhikkhū sāriputtataḥ paññāya hīna ati atthaḥ

original: 13. Upena
analyzed: upena

analyzed: hīna atthe upena yuttamhā dutiyāḥ upasāriputtam paññavanto

original: 16. Kattukaraṇesu tatiyā
analyzed: kattu karaṇesu tatiyā

analyzed: kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti jinena desitaḥ dhammaḥ buddhena jitaḥ māraḥ ahinā

original: Attapadhāno kiriyaṃ, yo nibbatteti kārako;

original: Karaṇe-taṃ pana duvidhaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravasena, yathā hatthena kammaṃ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, manasā dhammaṃ viññāyati. Dattena vihayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti.
analyzed: pana duvidham ajjhattika bāhira vasena yathā hatthena kammam karoti cakkhunā rūpam passati manasā dhammam viññāyati dattena vihayaḥ lunāti agginā kuṭim jhāpeti

analyzed: vīhim lunāti dattena nettena candam ikkhate

original: 17. Sahatthena
analyzed: sahatthena

analyzed: lakkhaṇe

original: 19. Hetumhi
analyzed: hetumhi

original: Vāsādilakkhaṇakriyāya hetuto tatiyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya vasati, na jaccā vasalo hoti, kammunā vasalo hoti, dānena bhogavā, ācārena kulaṃ, tena pāṇi kāmadado.

original: 20. Pañcamī+ṇe vā
analyzed: pañcamīṇe vā

original: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
analyzed: iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā satasmā baddhaḥ satena vā

original: 21. Guṇe
analyzed: guṇe

original: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho, jaḷattenavā, paññāya mutto,

original: Māsena bhuñjati, ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi, navahi māsehi vihāraṃ kārāpesi, kahāpaṇena

analyzed: attānam sammannati iti paccatte bahulaṃvidhānā kattari tatiyā evam tilehi khette vapati iti

analyzed: kamma atthe sumuttā mayam tena mahā samaṇena ati pañcamī atthe ca

original: 24. Catutthī sampadāne
analyzed: catutthī sampadāne

analyzed: acetanam sa cetanam vā paṭiggāhaka bhāvena apekkhitam tam sampadānam tam ca dādānā iti

analyzed: dhātutaḥ byappena yuttam eva tattha catutthī hoti tat ca dīyamānassa vatthuno a nivāraṇa ajjhesana anumatitaḥ

analyzed: tividhaḥ yathā buddhassa puppham deti bodhi rukkhassa jalam deti yācakassa dhanam

original: deti, bhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ deti.
analyzed: deti bhikkhūnam dānam deti

original: Anirākaraṇā+rādha-na+bbhanuññavasena hi;
analyzed: hi

original: Sampadānaṃ tidhā vuttaṃ, rukkha+yācaka+bhikkhavo.
analyzed: sampadānam tidhā vuttam rukkha yācaka bhikkhavaḥ

original: Ādhāravivakkhāyaṃ sattamīpi, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi, yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiyeti.
analyzed: ādhāra vivakkhāyam sattamī pi saṅghe gotami dehi saṅghe dinne aham ca iva pūjitaḥ bhavissāmi yā palāla mayam mālam nārī cetiyā iti

original: 25. Tādatthye
analyzed: tādatthye

original: Tādatthye catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāve, tādatthyaṃ, tasmiṃ tadatthabhāve jotanīyeva
analyzed: tādatthye catutthī siyā tad atthassa bhāve tādatthyam tasmin tad attha bhāve jotanīyā iva

original: catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāvoti nimittanimittīsambandhe chaṭṭhī, tasmā chaṭṭhāpavādo+yaṃ.
analyzed: catutthī siyā tad atthassa bhāvaḥ ti nimitta nimittī sambandhe chaṭṭhī tasmā chaṭṭha apavādaḥ yaṃ

original: Samepi nimittanimittīnaṃ sambandhe nimittabhūtayūpatova catutthī, no nimittībhūtadāruto.
analyzed: same pi nimitta nimittīnam sambandhe nimitta bhūta yūpataḥ u va catutthī naḥ nimittībhūta dārutaḥ

original: Yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajati, buddhassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, neva davāya, na
analyzed: yūpāya dāru pākāya vajati buddha satthāya jīvitam pariccajāmi na iva davāya na

original: madāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, lokānukampāya, phāsu vihārāya.
analyzed: madāya ūnassa pāripūriyai atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati loka anukampāya phāsu vihārāya

original: Iccāyaṃ kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthīti sādhitattā idha chaṭṭhīti dīpanatthaṃ vuccate –
analyzed: icca ayam kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthī iti sādhita ttā idha chaṭṭhī iti dīpana attham vuccate

original: Kassa sādu naruccati, mā ayasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
analyzed: kassa sādu naruccati mā ayasmantānam pi saṅgha bhedaḥ ruccittha khamati saṅghassa

original: bhatta+massa nacchādetīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ, na ce+vaṃ virodho siyā,
analyzed: bhattam assa na chādeti iti chaṭṭhī na ca evam virodhaḥ siyā

original: sadisarūpattā, evaṃvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā. Tathā hi bhāgavuttiyā
analyzed: sadisa rūpa ttā evaṃvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddika anumata ttā tathā hi bhāga vuttiyā

original: “upapadavibhatti chaṭṭhiyā+pavādā”ti vuttaṃ, saddantare vihitā vibhatti upapadavibhatti.

original: Kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā, kassa vā tuyhanti avatvā kassa
analyzed: kassa vā tvam dhammam rocesi iti attham atte paṭhamā kassa vā avatvā kassa

original: vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamāvasena byabhicāradassanā. Eva+maññāpi
analyzed: vā tvam dhammam rocesi iti attham atte paṭhamā vasena byabhicāra dassanā evam aññā api

original: viññeyyā, paratopi yathāgamaṃ.
analyzed: viññeyyā paratas api yathāgamam

original: Rañño sataṃ dhāreti rañño chattaṃ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhīva. Silāgha=kathane,

original: 27. Apaparīhi vajjane

original: 10. A+mādi

original: Uttarassa padassa+ttho, padhānaṃ liṅga+massa ca;

original: Dutiyantādipadekattho, bahudhā taṃ vibhajjate.

analyzed: tat ca bhiyyaḥ tappurisa ākhyayā

analyzed: am ādi antānam kārakānam akārakānam ca samāsaḥ vā hoti tat ca bahulam vidhānena ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Saraṇaṃ gatoti samāse kate “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti vibhattilopādi upari sabbattha pubbasamaṃ.

original: Bhavaṃ atīto bhavātīto, kālātīto. Pamāṇaṃ atikkantaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ, lokātikkantaṃ.

original: titthanāvā. Itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto, akkhadhutto. Chāyāyaṃ sukkho chāyāsukkho,

original: 11. Visesana+mekatthena
analyzed: visesanam ekatthena

original: Sāmaññavatthu yā vattha+ntarato tu visesiya;

original: pattaṅgaṃ, mañjeṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ. Idha na hoti nīlaṃ pītanti, guṇavacanattā ṇena vināpi
analyzed: pattaṅgam mañjeṭṭham kuṅkumam idha na hoti nīlam pītam ti guṇavacana ttā ṇena vinā api

original: dabbassā+bhidhānato.
analyzed: dabbassa abhidhānataḥ

original: 12. Nakkhatteni+nduyuttena kāle
analyzed: nakkhattena indu yuttena kāle

analyzed: phussena indu yuttena lakkhitā puṇṇamāsī phussī ratti phussaḥ ahaḥ maghāya indu yuttāya

analyzed: vā sugataḥ devatā assa sogataḥ māhindaḥ yāmaḥ vāruṇaḥ buddhaḥ assa devatā ati buddhaḥ

original: Phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti phusso māso. Evaṃ māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho,

analyzed: jeṭṭhamūlaḥ āsāḷhaḥ sāvaṇaḥ poṭṭhapādaḥ assayujaḥ kattikaḥ māgasiraḥ puṇṇamāsī ca

original: 14. Ta+madhīte taṃ jānāti ka+ṇikā ca
analyzed: tam adhīte tam jānāti kaṇikā ca

analyzed: tam adhīte tam jānāti iti etesu atthesu ṇo hoti kaḥ ṇikaḥ ca ettha ca saddaḥ

analyzed: tad ādesā tadīva bhavanti iti ñāyā

original: “sarāna”miccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni. Evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, vatthuvijjo,

original: chandaso, “manā, dīnaṃ saka” iti sakāgamo. Kamako, padako, venayiko, suttantiko,

analyzed: pasiddha upasaṃharaṇa ttham ca

original: 15. Tassa visaye dese
analyzed: tassa visaye dese

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā visaye desasarūpe ṇo hoti. Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto. Deseti kiṃ, cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ, devadattassa visayo+nuvāko.
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ visaye desa sarūpe ṇo hoti vasātīnam visayaḥ desaḥ vāsātaḥ deseti kim cakkhussa visayaḥ rūpam devadattassa visayaḥ anuvākaḥ

original: 16. Nivāse tannāme
analyzed: nivāse tad nāme

original: Ti tannāme nivāse dese ṇo hoti. Sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebbo. Ettha “yavā sare”ti yakāre bakārapubbarūpāni. Vāsāto.
analyzed: ti tad nāme nivāse dese ṇo hoti sivīnam nivāsaḥ desaḥ sebbaḥ ettha yavā sarā iti yakāre bakāra pubbarūpāni

original: 17. Adūrabhaveti
analyzed: adūra bhava iti

original: Ṇo, vidisāya adūrabhavaṃ vedisaṃ.
analyzed: ṇaḥ vidisāya adūra bhavam vedisam

original: 18. Tena nibbatteti

original: Tatiyantā nibbattatthe ṇo hoti. Kusambena nibbattā kosambī nagaraṃ, evaṃ kākandī, mākandī, sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā, hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
analyzed: tatiya antā nibbatta atthe ṇaḥ hoti kusambena nibbattā kosambī nagaram evam kākandī mākandī sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogam tatiyā

original: 19. Ta+midha+tthi
analyzed: tam idha atthi

original: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti, yaṃ taṃ paṭhamanta+matthi ce. Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, bādaro, pabbajo.
analyzed: paṭhama antāḥ idha ati sattamī atthe dese tad nāme ṇaḥ hoti yam tam paṭhama antam atthi ce udumbarāḥ asmin dese santi iti odumbaraḥ bādaraḥ pabbajaḥ

original: 20. Tatra bhaveti
analyzed: tatra bhava iti

analyzed: gaṇikā mādhuram vattham

analyzed: ṇ ikaḥ

original: 29. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddha+mabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati vahati jīvatiti
analyzed: tena katam kītam baddham abhisaṅkhatam saṃsaṭṭham hatam hanti jitam jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati vahati jīvatiti

analyzed: kītam vatthikam kumbhikam sovaṇṇikam ghātikam mūlataḥ va paccayaḥ a mūla vāci tā

original: devadattena kītoti na hoti, tadatthāppatītiyā. Varatthāya baddho vārattiko, āyasiko,

analyzed: uḷumpena tarati iti oḷumpikaḥ uḷumpikaḥ iti kullikaḥ gopucchikaḥ nāvikaḥ sakaṭena

original: 31. Tato sambhūta+māgataṃ

analyzed: ettha ca vākyam

original: mattikaṃ, pettikaṃ. Ṇya+riyaṇa+ryapaccayāpi dissanti. Surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ.

analyzed: yamhi thaññam ubhayattha lopaḥ vaṇṇi vaṇṇānam ti lopaḥ sambhūtaḥ pettiyaḥ

original: mātiyo, “rānubandhe+ntasarādissā”ti ulopo, mattiyo. Ryamhi-ulopo, cavaggapubbarūpāni, macco vā.
analyzed: mātiyoḥ ra anubandha inta sara ādissa āti u lopaḥ mattiyoḥ ryam hi u lopaḥ ca vagga pubbarūpāni maccaḥ vā

analyzed: tattha vasati viditaḥ bhattaḥ niyuttaḥ

original: āraññiko, rājagahiko, māgadhiko, sosāniko. Loke vidito lokiko. Catumahārājesu bhattā
analyzed: āraññikaḥ rājagahikaḥ māgadhiko sosānikaḥ loke viditaḥ lokiko catu mahārājesu bhattā

original: cātummahārājikā. Dvāre niyutto dovāriko, dassoka tadaminādipāṭhā. Bhaṇḍāgāriko. Ike-navakammiko,
analyzed: cātummahārājikāḥ dvāre niyuttaḥ dovārikaḥ bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ

original: ādikammiko. Kiye-jātikiyo, andhakiyo.
analyzed: ādi kammikaḥ kiyejātikiyaḥ andha kiyaḥ

original: 33. Tassi+daṃ
analyzed: tassidam

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā ida+micca+smiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti. Saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ,
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ idam iccasmin atthe ṇikaḥ hoti saṅghassa idam saṅghikam puggalikam

original: sakyaputtiko, nāṭaputtiko, jenadattiko. Kiye-sassa idaṃ sakiyo, parakiyo. Niyeattaniyaṃ.
analyzed: sakyaputtikaḥ nāṭa puttikaḥ jenadattikaḥ idam sakiyaḥ parakiyaḥ

original: Ke-sako, rañño idaṃ rājakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: kesakaḥ rañño idam rājakam bhaṇḍam

original: 34. Ṇo
analyzed: ṇaḥ

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā ida+micca+smiṃ atthe ṇo hoti. Kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ, byākaraṇaṃ, sogataṃ sāsanaṃ, māhisaṃ maṃsādi.
analyzed: chaṭṭhi yantāḥ idam iccasmin atthe ṇo hoti kaccāyanassa idam kaccāyanam byākaraṇam sogatam sa āsanam māhisam maṃsa ādi

original: 35. Gavādīhi yo
analyzed: go ādīhi yaḥ

original: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi ida+micca+smiṃ atthe yo hoti. Gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ, avaṅa, maṃsādi. Ilope kabbaṃ. Duno idaṃ dabbaṃ.
analyzed: go ādīhi chaṭṭhi yantehi idam iccasmin atthe yaḥ hoti gunnam idam gabyam avaṅa maṃsa ādi i lope kabbam dunaḥ idam dabbam

original: 36. Pitito bhātari reyyaṇa
analyzed: pititaḥ bhātari reyyaṇa

original: “Pitito mātito”ti tena tena suttanipāteneva ussa i. Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa. Pitu bhātā petteyyo.

original: 37. Mātito ca bhaginiyaṃ ccho
analyzed: ca bhaginiyam ccho

original: Mātuto ca pituto ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ ccho hoti. Mātu bhagini mātucchā, pitu bhagini pitucchā. Kathaṃ “mātu bhātā mātulo”ti, “mātulāditvānī”ti nipātanā lapaccayo.
analyzed: mātutaḥ ca pitutaḥ ca tesam bhaginiyam cchaḥ hoti mātu bhagini mātucchā pitu bhagini pitucchā katham mātu bhātā mātulaḥ iti mātula ādi tvāni iti nipātanā la paccayaḥ

original: 38. Mātāpitūsvā+maho
analyzed: mātā pitūsvāmaho

original: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitūsvā+maho hoti. Mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho. Pitu
analyzed: tesam hoti mātu mātā mātāmahī mātu pitā mātāmahaḥ pitu

original: mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho. Na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paccekābhisambandhato visuṃ visuṃ
analyzed: mātā pitāmahī pitu pitā pitāmahaḥ na yathāsaṅkhyam pacceka abhisambandhataḥ visum visum

original: mātāpitusaddehi tesaṃ mātāpitunnaṃ atthe paccayo hoti.
analyzed: mātā pitu saddehi tesam mātā pitunnam atthe paccayaḥ hoti

original: 39. Hite reyyaṇa
analyzed: hite reyyaṇa

original: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti. Mātu hito matteyyo, petteyyo.

original: 40. Nindā+ññāta+ppa paṭibhāga rassa dayā saññāsu ko
analyzed: nindā aññātappa paṭibhāga rassa dayā saññāsu ko

original: Rasserasso mānuso mānusako, rukkhako, pilakkhako. Dayāyaṃ-dayito=nukampito putto
analyzed: rasserassaḥ mānusaḥ mānusakaḥ rukkhakaḥ pilakkhakaḥ dayāyan dayitaḥ nukampito putto

original: puttako, vacchako. Saññāyaṃ-moro viya morako, katako, bhatako.
analyzed: puttakaḥ vacchakaḥ saññāyaṃmoraḥ viya morako katakaḥ bhatako

original: 41. Ta+massa parimāṇaṃ ṇiko ca
analyzed: tamassa parimāṇam ṇikaḥ ca

original: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: paṭhama antāḥ assa iti asmin atthe ṇ ikaḥ hoti kaḥ ca paṭhama antam parimāṇam bhavati

original: Doṇādīnaṃ parimitavīhādīnaṃ karaṇattā “parimīyantya+nenāti parimāṇa”nti hoti. Doṇo
analyzed: doṇa ādīnam parimita vīha ādīnam karaṇa ttā parimīyanti anena ati hoti doṇaḥ

original: parimāṇa+massāti doṇiko vīhi, khārasatiko, khārasahassiko, āsītiko vayo, upaḍḍhakāyo

original: 42. Ya+te+tehi+ttako
analyzed: yat e te hittakaḥ

original: Yādīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhyatthe ttako hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: ya ādīhi paṭhama antehi assa iti chaṭṭhī atthe ttakaḥ hoti paṭhama antam parimāṇam bhavati

original: Yaṃ parimāṇa+massa yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, “etasseṭa ttake”ti etassa eṭa, ettakaṃ. Āvatake-yaṃ

original: parimāṇa+massa yāvatako, tāvatako.

analyzed: sabbatas paṭhama antāḥ ya ādīhi ca assa iti chaṭṭhī atthe hoti tat ce paṭhamantam parimāṇam bhavati sabbam parimāṇam assa sabbāvantam napuṃsaka iti aṃ yāvantam tāvantam

analyzed: kati iṃ bhāga lopaḥ kīva kīvatakam kittakam rīvantaḥ asaṃkhyaḥ

analyzed: sañjātam

analyzed: māne matto

analyzed: paṭhama antā māna vuttitaḥ assa iti asmin atthe mattaḥ hoti palam ummānam assa pala mattam

analyzed: hatthaḥ paṇāmam assa hattha mattam satam mānam assa sata mattam doṇaḥ parimāṇam assa

analyzed: abheda upacārāḥ hoti mīyate enā iti mānam mānassa sambandhi ttā

analyzed: uddha mānantu ummānam parimāṇantu sabbatas

analyzed: taggha u cuddham

analyzed: ayubha dvitīya haṃse

analyzed: ḍe sati ssati

analyzed: ma pañca ādi kati h iti

analyzed: cha ṭṭhamī catuttha dutiyesu esam tatiya paṭhama ati nipātanā pūraṇa atthe dvitaḥ tiyaḥ

original: 55. Ekā kā+kya+sahāye

original: “Sati byabhicāre visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ”ti ñāyā saṃkhyāto visesetuṃ “asahāye”ti vuttaṃ. Ekasmā asahāyatthe ka+ākī honti vā. Ekova ekako, ekākī, eko vā.

original: 56. Vacchādīhi tanutte taro
analyzed: vacchādīhi tanutte taro

original: attaniyapavattinimittaṃ. Susuttassa tanutte vacchataro, itthiyaṃ vacchatarī. Yobbanassa
analyzed: attaniya pavatti nimittam susuttassa tanutte vacchataraḥ itthiyam vacchatarī yobbanassa

original: tanutte okkhataro. Okkhā=dutiyavayaṭṭhagoṇo. Assabhāvassa tanutte assataro. Gāvoti
analyzed: tanutte okkhataro assa bhāvassa tanutte assataro gāvaḥ iti

original: jātisāmatthiyassa tanutte usabhataro. Ettha tanuttaṃ appabalatā.
analyzed: jāti sāmatthiyassa tanutte usabhataraḥ ettha tanuttam appabala tā

original: 57. Kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara+ratamā
analyzed: kimhā niddhāraṇe ratararatamā

original: Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe ratara+ratamā honti. Ko evāti kataro bhavataṃ devadatto, kataro
analyzed: niddhāraṇe honti kaḥ eva ati kataraḥ

original: bhavataṃ kaṭṭho. Katamo bhavataṃ devadatto, katamo bhavataṃ kaṭṭho. Bhāradvājānaṃ katamo+si brahme.
analyzed: bhavatam kaṭṭho katamaḥ bhavatam devadatto katamaḥ bhavatam kaṭṭhaḥ bhāradvājānam katamaḥ asi brahme

original: 58. Tena datte li+yāti
analyzed: tena datte

original: Datte+bhidheyye la+iyā honti bahulādhikārā manussasaññāyaṃ. Devena datto devalo deviyo,
analyzed: datta ibhidheyye laiyāḥ honti bahula adhikārāḥ manussa saññā ayam devena dattaḥ devalaḥ deviyaḥ

original: (Rattamiccādianekatthataddhitaṃ).
analyzed: rattam it ca ādi aneka attha taddhitam

analyzed: tassa bhāva kamma sutta tātta naṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā

original: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ. Na sabbe paccayā sabbato honti aññatratta+tāhi. Bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddāti bhāvo saddapavattinimittaṃ. Vuttañca –

original: Hontya+smā saddabuddhīti, bhāvo taṃ saddavuttiyā;
analyzed: honti asmai tam sadda vuttiyā

original: Nimittabhūtaṃ nāmañca, jāti dabbaṃ kriyā guṇoti.

original: Pañhādīsu kriyatthato eyyādayo honti.
analyzed: pañha ādīsu kriyatthataḥ eyya ādayaḥ honti

original: Pañhā saṃpucchanaṃ, iṭṭhā-siṃsanaṃ yācanaṃ duve;
analyzed: pañhā saṃpucchanam iṭṭhāsiṃsanam yācanam duve

original: Patthanā, bhattiyā vā+tha, na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi.
analyzed: patthanā bhattiyā vā atha na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi

original: Pañhe-kiṃ so bhattaṃ paceyya, udāhu byañjanaṃ. Patthanāyaṃ-aho vata so paceyya ce. Vidhimhi-bhavaṃ pattaṃ paceyya. (Eyyādipaccayanayo).
analyzed: so bhattam paceyya udāhu byañjanam vata so paceyya ce vidhimhibhavam pattam paceyya eyya ādi paccayanayo

original: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ ssu vho e āmase
analyzed: tu antu hi tha mi ma tam antam

original: Pañhapatthanāvidhisve+te honti kriyatthato. Āsiṃsanatthe-so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
analyzed: sukhī bhavatu te sukhitāḥ bhavantu

original: 48. Hissa+to lopo
analyzed: hiḥ sataḥ lopaḥ

original: Ato parassa hissa vā lopo hoti. Tvaṃ sukhī bhava bhavāhi, himhi dīgho. “Eyyāthā”dinā
analyzed: a taḥ parassa hissa vā lopaḥ hoti tvam sukhī bhava bhavāhi himhi dīghaḥ

original: vhoka, tumhe sukhitā bhavathavho bhavatha. Ahaṃ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṃ sukhino bhavāma.
analyzed: tumhe sukhitāḥ bhavathavhaḥ bhavatha aham sukhī bhavāmi mayam sukhinaḥ bhavāma

original: Paracchakke-tathā bhavataṃ, bhavantaṃ. Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave bhavāmase. Kamme-tayā
analyzed: bhavatam bhavantam bhavassu bhavavhaḥ bhave bhavāmase

original: anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu iccādi. Bhāve-bhūyatu, bhūyataṃ.
analyzed: anubhūyatu anubhūyantu iccādi

original: Āṇattiyaṃ-devadatto dāni odanaṃ pacatu, pacantu iccādi. Kamme-tena odano paccatu
analyzed: āṇattiyam devadattaḥ dāni odanam pacatu pacantu iccādi kammetena odanaḥ paccatu

original: iccādi. Tathā so gāmaṃ gacchatu iccādi. “Ū lasse”ti lasse+kāre gametu, gamentu iccādi.
analyzed: iccādi tathā saḥ gāmam gacchatu iccādi lassa iti lassa ikāre gametu gamentu iccādi

original: Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi. Kamme-gacchīyatu iccādi. Tathā gamīyatu iccādi.
analyzed: ghamma ādese ghammatu ghammantu iccādi tathā gamīyatu iccādi

original: Vidhimhi-lassa lope lutte vuddhi, idha pabbato hotu.
analyzed: vidhimhilassa lope lutte idha pabbataḥ hotu

original: Nimantane-adhivāsetha tumhe bhante bhagavā bhojanaṃ, vasatissa “curādito ṇī”ti ṇimhi
analyzed: nimantane adhivāsetha tumhe bhante bhagavā bhojanam vasatissa cur āditaḥ ṇi iti ṇimhi

analyzed: assā ṇa anubandhā iti ā paccaye iti e ca hoti idha nissīdatu bhavam

original: sadassa “jara+sadāna+mīma vā”ti īma, manubandhattā antasarato īma.
analyzed: sadassa jarasadānam īma vāti īma manubandhattā antasarataḥ īma

original: Ajjhesane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ, ettha curādittā purimasamaṃ.
analyzed: bhante bhagavā dhammam ettha curā t ittā purima samaṃ

original: Anumatiyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, pavisatu bhavaṃ. Ettha pucchato hissa lopo. Evaṃ nisīda.
analyzed: anumatiyam puccha vāsava mam pañham pavisatu bhavam ettha pucchataḥ hissa lopaḥ evam nisīda

original: Patthanā=yācanā, tatra-dada=dāne, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, dāto lassa ekāre ca ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi.
analyzed: patthanā yācanā dadāhi me gām avarāni pañca dāto lassaḥ eka are ca ekam me nayanam dehi

original: Pattakāle-sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṃ karotu bhavaṃ. Ettha “tanāditvo”ti o.
analyzed: te kālaḥ kaṭa karaṇe kaṭam karotu bhavam ettha o

original: Tvādī eyyādayo vatta-mānā sampati,+nāgate;
analyzed: tu ādī eyi ādayaḥ vattamānā sampatinā āgate

original: Bhavissati, parokkhādi-cattāro+tītakālikā.
analyzed: bhavissati

original: 5,173. Gama yami+sā+sa disānaṃ vā cchaṅa
analyzed: gama yamisāsa disānam vā chaṅa

analyzed: etesam vā cchaṅ hotintamānatyādīsu saḥ saggam gacchati gameti gacchanti iccādi

original: Kamme-gacchīyati gamīyati iccādi. Yama=uparame, parokkhāanajjatanarūpāni sabbattha
analyzed: kammegacchīyati gamīyati iccādi yama auparame parokkha aanajjatana rūpāni sabbattha

original: payoga+manugamma yojetabbāni. Nipubbo, niyacchati niyamati, niyacchanti niyamanti.
analyzed: payogam anugamma yojetabbāni nipubbaḥ niyacchati niyamati niyacchanti niyamanti

analyzed: saṃpubbaḥ ye saṃssāti ññattam saññamati saññamanti kammeniyacchīyati niyamīyati

original: niyammati, saññamīyati vā. Tathā niyacchissati, saññamissati. Niyacchi, saṃyami.
analyzed: niyammati saññamīyati vā tathā niyacchissati saññamissati niyacchi saṃyami

original: Niyacchissa, saṃyamissa. Niyaccheyya, saṃyameyya. Niyacchatu, saññamatu. Isa+siṃsa=icchāyaṃ,
analyzed: niyacchissa saṃyamissa niyaccheyya saṃyameyya niyacchatu saññamatu

original: so saggaṃ icchati, icchanti iccādi. “Lahussupantassā”ti vuddhimhi esati, esanti iccādi.
analyzed: saḥ saggam icchati icchanti iccādi vuddhimhi esati esanti iccādi

original: Kamme-icchīyati, “vā kvacī”ti vuddhimhi esīyati. Pubbarūpe issati issate iccādi.
analyzed: vā kvaci iti vuddhimhi esīyati pubbarūpe issati issate iccādi

original: Icchissati esissati iccādi. Icchi esi. Icchissa esissa. Iccheyya eseyya. Icchatu
analyzed: icchissati esissati iccādi icchi esi icchissa esissa iccheyya eseyya icchatu

original: esatu iccādi. Āsa=upavesane, so āsane acchati iccādi. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti rasso,
analyzed: iccādi āsa upavesane so āsane acchati iccādi byañjane dīgha rassā ati

original: upapubbo, tathā upāsati. Acchissati upāsissati. Acchi upāsi. Acchissa upāsissa. Accheyya
analyzed: upapubbaḥ tathā upāsati acchissati upāsissati acchi upāsi acchissa upāsissa accheyya

original: upāseyya. Acchatu upāsatu iccādi. Disa=pekkhane, dicchati dicchanti iccādi sabbaṃ
analyzed: upāseyya acchatu upāsatu iccādi disa apekkhane dicchati dicchanti iccādi sabbam

original: purimasamaṃ. Labha=lābhe, ito paraṃ visesaṭṭhānamevavakkhāma, sabbavāro vuttānusārena
analyzed: purima samam labha lābhe ito param sabba vāraḥ vutta anusārena

original: gahetabbo. Labhati, labhanti iccādi. Kamme-kyassa pubbarūpādimhi kate labbhati iccādi.
analyzed: gahetabbaḥ labhati labhanti iccādi kammekyassa pubbarūpa ādimhi kate labbhati iccādi

original: 73. Labhā iṃ+īnaṃ thaṃ thā vā
analyzed: labhā iṃīnam tham thā vā

analyzed: labhasmai iṃ īnam thaṃthā vā honti saḥ alabhittha labhittha alabhi labhi iṃ paccaye alattham alabhiṃ iccādi

analyzed: labha vasat chida bhida rudānam chaṅa

analyzed: kriyā atipattiyam ssā bhāgassa cchaṅ ādese alacchā alabhissaḥ iccādi vasa nivāse vacchati

analyzed: vasissati ukāraḥ pubbarūpe vussati vussissati iccādi

original: Tathā avacchā avasissā. Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, checchati chindissati, “mañca rudhādīnaṃ”ti
analyzed: tathā avacchā avasissā chidat vedhā karaṇe checchati chindissati

original: maṃ lo ca. Lassa lopo ca. Bhida=vidāraṇe, bhecchati bhindissati. Abhecchā abhindissā.
analyzed: mam laḥ ca lassa lopaḥ ca bhida vidāraṇe bhecchati bhindissati a bhecchā a bhindissā

analyzed: ruda rodane rucchati rodissati a rucchāḥ a rodissāḥ iccādi

analyzed: añña paccaye pi chidassa cchaṅaḥ iti yogavibhāgā cchaṅa bhūte ūm paccaye acchecchuṃ

analyzed: a chindiṃsu vuttataḥ añña dhātūnam ca gama gamane gaccham gacchissam añña paccaye pi

analyzed: vaca byatta vacane i c ādi kamme bahula adhikārā tya ādīsu para bhūte supi yathāgamam

analyzed: ī ā daḥ vacaḥsoma

analyzed: sarā paraḥ avoci avocum avocaḥ iccādi an ajja tane avaca avacā vacā iccādi

analyzed: vā hoti vā

original: lo ca, jīrati. Kamme-jīrīyati jīyīyati. Evaṃ jīyissati jīrissati, jīyīyissati jīrīyissati.

analyzed: ajīyi ajīri ajīyīyi ajīrīyi ajīyissā ajīrissā ajīyīyissā ajīyissā ajīyissā

original: Disa=pekkhane,
analyzed: disa apekkhane

analyzed: disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhāti

original: Ete ādesā disassa vā honti. Anekavaṇṇattā sabbādeso. Passati passanti, dakkhati dakkhanti. Kamme-kye pubbarūpo, dissati dissanti, vipassīyati dakkhīyati iccādi.

original: apassiṃsu passiṃsu apasso passo, apassittha passittha. Apassiṃ passiṃ, apassimha
analyzed: a passiṃsu passiṃsu a passaḥ passaḥ apassittha passittha a passim passim apassimha

original: Sada=visaraṇagatyāvasādanādānesu, nipubbo, “jarasadāna+mīma vā”ti īmaāgamo. Nisīdati, nisīdanti iccādi. Bhāve-nisajjati, nisajjate.
analyzed: sada visaraṇa gati avasādana ādānesu nipubbaḥ vāti īma āgamaḥ nisīdati nisīdanti iccādi bhāvenisajjati nisajjate

original: Yaja=devapūjāsaṃgatikaraṇadānesu, yajati, yajanti iccādi. Kamme –

original: 5,113. Yajassa yassa ṭi+yīti
analyzed: yajassa yassa ṭiyi iti

original: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandheti bahulādhikārā tyādivisayepi kye pubbarūpe
analyzed: yajassa yassa ṭiyī honti ka anubandhā iti bahula adhikārā tya ādi visaye pi kye pubbarūpe

original: ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddho. So yajissati, tena ijjissate yijjissate. So yajī,
analyzed: ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddhaḥ saḥ yajissati tena ijjissate yijjissate saḥ yajī

original: tena ijji yijji. So yajissā, tena ijjissā yijjissā. So yajeyya, tena ijjeyya yijjeyya.
analyzed: tena ijji yijji saḥ yajissā tena ijjissā yijjissā saḥ yajeyya tena ijjeyya yijjeyya

original: So yajatu, tena ijjatu yijjatu iccādi.
analyzed: saḥ yajatu tena ijjatu yijjatu iccādi

analyzed: vadīyati vajjīyanti vajjanti vadīyanti vadissati vadissanti avadī vadī avadiṃsu

original: vadiṃsu. Avadissa vadissa. Vajje vajjeyya vade vadeyya, vajjeyyuṃ vadeyyuṃ. Vajjetu
analyzed: vadiṃsu a vadissa vadissa vajje vajjeyya vade vadeyya vajjeyyum vadeyyum vajjetu

analyzed: vadetu vadatu id ca ādi yathāgamam ñeyyam

original: Kamu=padavikkhepe, “parokkhāyañcā”ti caggahaṇena kama kama iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope
analyzed: kamu pada vikkhepe parokkhā yat ca ati ca ggahaṇena kama kamaḥ iti an ādi byañjana lope

original: Cala=kampane, caṃcalati. Jala+dala=dittiyaṃ, dvitte daddallati iccādi. (Savuddhikabhūvādinayo).
analyzed: cala kampane caṃcalati jala dala dittiyam dvitte iccādi

original: Hū+bhū=sattāyaṃ, tyādīsu “kattari lo”ti lo, tassa lope “yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye”ti okāro. So hoti, te honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa iccādi. Bhāve-tena hūyati hūyate.
analyzed: hū bhū sattā ayam tyādīsu kattari lo ti lo tassa lope paccaya iti okāraḥ saḥ hoti te honti hosi hotha homi homaḥ iccādi bhāva etena hūyati hūyate

original: 31. Hūssa he+hehi+hohi ssatyādo
analyzed: hūssa he he hi hohi ssatya adaḥ

original: Hūssa heādayo honti ssaccādo. Hessati hehi ssati hohissati.

original: 69. Dakkha+kha+hehi+hohīhi lopoti
analyzed: dakkha kha hehi ho hīhi lopaḥ uti

original: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopo hoti. Hehiti hehissati, hohiti hohissati.
analyzed: dakkha ādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopaḥ hoti he hiti he hissati ho hiti ho hissati

original: chijjissanti. Achindi chindi, acchejji, acchejjiṃsu. Acchindissā achijjissā. Chinde
analyzed: chijjissanti achindi chindi acchejji acchejjiṃsu acchindissā achijjissā chinde

original: chindeyya, chijje chijjeyya, chindatu, chindantu, chijjatu, chijjantu iccādi.
analyzed: chindeyya chijje chijjeyya chindatu chindantu chijjatu chijjantu iccādi

original: Bhuja=pālanajjhohāresu, bhuñjati, bhuñjanti iccādi. Bhavissatimhi “bhuja+muca+vaca+visānaṃ
analyzed: bhuja pālana jhohāresu bhuñjati bhuñjanti iccādi bhavissatimhi

original: kkhaṅa”ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhuñjissati, bhokkhanti,
analyzed: dhātu antena saha ssassa kkhaṅ ādese bhokkhati bhuñjissati bhokkhanti

original: bhuñjissanti iccādi.
analyzed: bhuñjissanti iccādi

original: Muca=mocane, muccati, muccanti iccādi. Kamme-muccati, muccanti iccādi. (Rudhādinayo).
analyzed: muca mocane muccati muccanti iccādi

original: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṃsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
analyzed: divakīḷā vijigiṃsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu

original: 5,21. Divādīhi yaka
analyzed: divā dīhi yaka

original: Divādīhi kattari lavisaye yaka hoti. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho, eva+mupari ca.
analyzed: diva ādīhi kattari la visaye ya ka hoti kakāraḥ evam upari ca

original: Vassa bakāre pubbarūpaṃ, so jutaṃ dibbati, dibbanti iccādi. Kamme-kye tena dibbati,
analyzed: vassa bakāre pubbarūpam saḥ jutam dibbati dibbanti iccādi kammekye tena dibbati

original: dibbanti iccādi. Dibbissati, tena dibbissati. Adibbi dibbi. Tena adibbi dibbi. Adibbissa.
analyzed: dibbanti iccādi dibbissati tena dibbissati adibbi dibbi tena adibbi dibbi adibbissa

original: Tena adibbissa. Dibbe dibbeyya. Tena dibbe dibbeyya. Dibbatu. Tena dibbatu iccādi.
analyzed: tena adibbissa dibbe dibbeyya tena dibbe dibbeyya dibbatu tena dibbatu iccādi

original: Siva=tantusantāne, sibbati, sibbanti iccādi. Pada=gamane, upubbo, cavaggapubbarūpāni,
analyzed: siva tantu santāne sibbati sibbanti iccādi pada gamane u pubbaḥ ca vagga pubba rūpāni

original: uppajjati, uppajjare uppajjanti iccādi. Kammekye tena paṭipajjate iccādi. Bhāve-uppajjate
analyzed: uppajjati uppajjare uppajjanti iccādi kammekye tena paṭipajjate iccādi bhāve uppajjate

original: tayā. Budha=avagamane, jhakārapubbarūpāni yakkharesu. Dhammaṃ bujjhati, bujjhare
analyzed: tayā budha avagamane jhakāra pubbarūpāni yakkharesu dhammam bujjhati bujjhare

original: bujjhanti iccādi. Kamme-mayā dhammo bujjhate iccādi. Yudha=sampahāre, yujjhati+ccādi.
analyzed: bujjhanti iccādi dhammaḥ bujjhate iccādi yudha sampahāre yujjhati iccādi

original: Naha=bandhane, “hassa vipallāso”ti ye vipallāso, sannayhati+ccādi. Mana=ñāṇe, ññakāra+pubbarūpāni,
analyzed: naha bandhane hassa vipallāsaḥ iti ye vipallāsaḥ san nayha ticca ādi mana ñāṇe ññakāra pubbarūpāni

original: maññati+ccādi. Tusa=tuṭṭhimhi, pubbarūpe tussati+ccādi. Sama=upasame, sammati+ccādi.
analyzed: mañña ti cca ādi tus a tuṭṭhimhi pubba rūpe tussati cca ādi sama upasame samma ti cca ādi

original: Jana=janane, “janissā”ti ā hoti kānubandhe bahulādhikārā, so jāyati, jāyanti+ccādi.
analyzed: jana janane ā hoti ka anubandhe bahula adhikārā saḥ jāyati jāyanti ccādi

original: Kamme-janituṃ payojetīti “payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce”ti ṇimhi “aññatrāpī”ti vuddhipaṭisedhe
analyzed: payojeti iti payojaka byāpāre ca iti ṇimhi aññatra api iti vuddhi paṭisedhe

original: kyamhi “dīgho sarassā”ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati, janīyanti iccādi. So jāyissati.
analyzed: kyamhi dīghaḥ sarassāti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati janīyanti iccādi saḥ jāyissati

original: Tena janissati. So ajāyi, tena ajanīyi. So ajāyissa, tena ajanīyissa. So jāye jāyeyya,
analyzed: tena janissati saḥ ajāyi tena ajanīyi saḥ ajāyissa tena ajanīyissa saḥ jāye jāyeyya

original: tena janīyeyya. So jāyatu, tena janīyatu iccādi. (Divādinayo).
analyzed: saḥ jāyatu tena janīyatu iccādi

original: Tuda=byathane,
analyzed: tuda byathane

original: 5,22. Tudādīhi ko
analyzed: tud ādi ī hi kaḥ

original: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati, tudanti iccādi. Kamme-tudyati tujjati,
analyzed: tud ādīhi kattari la visaye kaḥ hoti tudati tudanti iti ādi

original: tudyare tudyanti, tujjare tujjanti+ccādi. Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṃsu,
analyzed: tudyare tudyanti tujjare tujjanticca ādi tathā tudissati tujjissati a tudi a tudiṃsu

original: atujji. Atudissa atujjissa, tudeyya tujjeyya. Tudatu, tudantu, tujjatu iccādi.
analyzed: a tujji a tudissa a tujjissa tudeyya tujjeyya tudatu tudantu tujjatu iccādi

original: Visa=pavesane, papubbo. So gāmaṃ pavisati iccādi. Kamme-pavisīyati iccādi. Pavisissati.
analyzed: visa pavesane so gāmam pavisati iccādi iccādi pavisissati

original: Pavisīyissati. Pāvisi, īmhi “bhujamucā” dinā yogavibhāgā kkhaṅa. Pāvisi, pavisi pāvekkhi,
analyzed: pavisīyissati pāvisi īmhi bhuja mucā dinā yogavibhāgā kkhaṅa pāvisi pavisi pāvekkhi

original: pathaviṃ pāvisiṃsu pavisiṃsu. Pāvisīyi. Pāvisissa pavisissa. Pāvisīyissa. Pavise
analyzed: pathavim pāvisiṃsu pavisiṃsu pāvisīyi pāvisissa pavisissa pāvisīyissa pavise

original: paviseyya, vikaraṇalopo pavisīyeyya. Pavisatu, pavisīyatu iccādi. Nudati. Disa=uccāraṇe,
analyzed: paviseyya vikaraṇa lopaḥ pavisīyeyya pavisatu pavisīyatu iccādi nudati disā uccāraṇe

original: uddissati, likhati, tusati iccādi. (Tudādinayo).
analyzed: uddissati likhati tusati iccādi tud ādi nayaḥ

original: Ji=jaye,
analyzed: jijaye

original: 5,23. Jyādīhi knā
analyzed: jyā ādīhi knā

original: Jyādīhi kattari lavisaye knā hoti. Na vuddhi. Kilese jināti, jinanti. Tena kileso
analyzed: jyā ādīhi kattari la visaye hoti na kilesaḥ jināti jinanti tena kilesaḥ

original: jīyati, jīyanti, kye dīgho. Jinissati, jinissanti. Ajini jini. Ajīyi, ajīyittha.
analyzed: jīyati jīyanti kye dīghaḥ jinissati jinissanti ajini jini ajīyi ajīyittha

original: Ajinissa. Ajīyissa. Jineyya. Jinātu iccādi. Ci=caye, tathā cināti, cinanti iccādi.
analyzed: ajinissa ajīyissa jineyya jinātu iccādi cicaye tathā cināti cinanti iccādi

original: Ñā=avabodhane,
analyzed: ñā avabodhane

original: 5,120. Ñāssa ne jā
analyzed: ñāssa ne jā

original: Ñādhātussa jā hoti nakāre. Vijānāti.
analyzed: ñā dhātuḥ sa jā hoti nakāre vijānāti

original: 61. Ñāssa sanāssa nāyo timhi
analyzed: ñāssa sa nāssa nāyaḥ timhi

original: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, vijānāti iccādi. Kamme-viññāyati iccādi.
analyzed: sa nāssa ñāssa nāyaḥ vā hoti timhi nāyati vijānāti iccādi

original: Kye “āsse cā”ti ettha “āsse”ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti, yassa dvitte ñeyyati, ñeyyanti
analyzed: kye āsse ca ati ettha āsse iti yogavibhāgāḥ āsse hoti yassa

original: iccādi. Vijānissati, vijānissanti. Kamme – “kyassa sse”ti kyalope rasse ca kate ñāssati,
analyzed: iccādi vijānissati vijānissanti kamme kyassa ssa iti kya lope rasse ca kate

original: ñāssanti, viññāyissati, paññāyissati.
analyzed: ñāssanti viññāyissati paññāyissati

original: 65. Ssassa hi kamme
analyzed: ssassa hi kamme

original: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti. Añāgame samajāni, saṃjāni, saṃjāniṃsu. Samajā- niṃsu. Kamme-paññāyi, paññāyiṃsu. Ajānissa. Kamme-aññāyissa.
analyzed: ñā taḥ parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme paññāyihiti paññāyihinti añ āgame samajāni saṃjāni saṃjāniṃsu samajāniṃsu kamme paññāyi paññāyiṃsu ajānissa kamme aññāyissa

original: 63. Eyyassi+yāñā vā
analyzed: ey yas siya āñāḥ vā

original: Ñāto parassa eyyassa iyā+ñā honti vā. Jāniyā.
analyzed: ñā taḥ parassa eyyassa iyāñā honti vā jāniyā

original: 62. Ñāmhi jaṃ
analyzed: ñāmhi jam

original: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ vā hoti. Jaññā, jāneyya, jāneyyuṃ. Kamme-paññāyeyya, paññāyeyyuṃ. Vijānātu, vijānanthu. Kamme-viññāyatu iccādi.
analyzed: ña ādese sa na āssa ña assa jam vā hoti jaññā jāneyya jāneyyum kamme paññāyeyya paññāyeyyum vijānātu vijānanthu kamme viññāyatu iccādi

original: Mā=māne, “ā ī ssādīnaṃ byañjanassiña” iti iñaiti yogavibhāgā iñāgame pubbasaralopo,
analyzed: ā ī ssa ādīnam byañjanaḥ iñaḥ iti iñaḥ eti yogavibhāgāḥ iñ āgame pubba sara lopaḥ

original: mināti, minanti. Kamme-mīyati iccādi. Lū=chedane, “kṇāknāsu rasso”ti dhātussa rasso,
analyzed: mināti minanti iccādi lū chedane dhātussa

original: lunāti, lunanti. Kamme-lūyati iccādi. Dhu=kampane, dhunāti iccādi. (Jyādinayo).
analyzed: lunāti lunanti kammelūyati iccādi dhu kampane dhunāti iccādi

original: Kī=dabbavinīmaye,
analyzed: kīdap ba vi nīmaye

original: 24. Kyādīhi kṇā
analyzed: kya ādi hi kṇā

original: Kyādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. “Kṇāknāsu rasso”ti rasse kiṇāti, kiṇanti iccādi. Kamme-vikkīyati,
analyzed: kya ādīhi la visaye kṇā hoti kṇā knāsu rassoti rasse kiṇāti kiṇanti iccādi

original: vikkīyanti. Vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. Vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. Akiṇi, vikkiṇi,
analyzed: vikkīyanti vikkiṇissati vikkiṇissanti vikkīyissati vikkīyissanti akiṇi vikkiṇi

original: vikkīyi. Akiṇissa, vikkiṇissa. Vikkiṇe vikkiṇeyya.
analyzed: vikkīyi akiṇissa vikkiṇissa vikkiṇe vikkiṇeyya

original: Vikkīye. Vikkīyeyya. Vikkiṇātu, vikkiṇantu, vikkīyatu, vikkīyantu iccādi. Su=savane, suṇāti, suṇanti iccādi.
analyzed: vikkīye vikkīyeyya vikkiṇātu vikkiṇantu vikkīyatu vikkīyantu iccādi su savane suṇāti suṇanti iccādi

original: Saka=sattiyaṃ,
analyzed: sakasattiyam

original: 5,121. Sakā+pānaṃ kuka+ku ṇe
analyzed: saka apānam kuka ku ṇe

original: Saka+āpānaṃ kuka+kuiccete āgamā honti ṇe. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Sakkunāti, sakkunanti.
analyzed: sakaāpānam kukakuicca ite āgamāḥ honti ṇe sakkuṇāti sakkuṇanti sakkunāti sakkunanti

original: 53. Sse vā
analyzed: s se vā

original: Sakasmā kṇāssa kkho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
analyzed: sakasmā kṇa assa kkhaḥ vā hoti sse sakkhissati sakkhissanti

original: 58. Sakā kṇāssa kha īādo
analyzed: sakā kṇa assa khaḥ ī ādaḥ

original: Sakasmā kṇāssa kho vā hoti īādīsu. Asakkhi sakkhi, sakkhiṃsu. Asakkhissa, asakkhissaṃsu. Sakkuṇe sakkuṇeyya. Sakkuṇātu, sakkuṇantu.
analyzed: sakasmā kho vā hoti ī ādīsu asakkhi sakkhi sakkhiṃsu asakkhissa asakkhissaṃsu sakkuṇe sakkuṇeyya sakkuṇātu sakkuṇantu

original: Apa=pāpuṇane, papubbo, “sakā+pānaṃ kuka+ku ṇe”ti kukate sampatti pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti
analyzed: apapāpuṇane saka apānam sampatti pāpuṇāti pāpuṇanti

original: iccādi. Kammepāpīyati, pāpīyanti. Pāpuṇissati, pāpuṇissanti. Kamme-pāpīyissati, pāpīyissanti.
analyzed: iccādi kamme pāpīyati pāpīyanti pāpuṇissati pāpuṇissanti kamme pāpīyissati pāpīyissanti

original: Pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṃsu. Kamme-pāpīyi, pāpīyittha. Apāpuṇissa. Kamme-apāpīyissa. Pāpuṇe,
analyzed: pāpuṇi pāpuṇiṃsu kamme pāpīyi pāpīyittha apāpuṇissa kamme apāpīyissa pāpuṇe

original: pāpuṇeyya. Kamme-pāpīyeyya. Pāpuṇātu, pāpuṇantu. Kamme-pāpīyatu iccādi. (Kyādinayo).
analyzed: pāpuṇeyya kamme pāpīyeyya pāpuṇātu pāpuṇantu kamme pāpīyatu iccādi kya ādi nayo

original: Su=savane,
analyzed: su savane

original: 25. Svādīhi kṇo
analyzed: svādīhi kṇo

original: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Kānubandhattā na vuddhi. Dhammaṃ suṇoti. Parassaralope
analyzed: su ādīhi la visaye kṇaḥ hoti ka anubandha ttā na dhammam suṇoti parassara lope

original: suṇonti. Kamme-kye dīghe sūyati, sūyanti. Dvitte suyyati suyyanti+ccādi. Iñāgame
analyzed: suṇonti kammekye dīghe sūyati sūyanti dvitte suyyati suyyanticca ādi iñ āgame

original: suṇissati, suṇissanti. Kamme-kyalope vuddhi. Sossati, sossanti iccādi. Asuṇi suṇi, asuṇiṃsu suṇiṃsu.
analyzed: suṇissanti suṇissanti iccādi asuṇi suṇi asuṇiṃsu suṇiṃsu

original: 60. Tesu suto kṇo+kṇānaṃ roṭa
analyzed: tesu sutaḥ kṇokṇānam roṭa

original: Tesu īādīsu suto paresaṃ kṇo+kṇānaṃ roṭa vā hoti. Rakāro anubandho. Ṭo sabbādesattho.
analyzed: tesu ī ādīsu su taḥ paresam kṇa u kṇānam vā hoti rakāraḥ anubandhaḥ ṭaḥ sabba ādesa atthaḥ

original: Ussa lope dvittaṃ īssa si ca. Assosi, assosiṃsu. “Iṃssa ca siña”ti yogavibhāgā siña,
analyzed: ussa lope dvittam īssa si ca assosi assosiṃsu iṃssa ca siñati yogavibhāgā

original: assosiṃsu, paccassosuṃ. Asuyi, asuyittha. Asuṇissa, tena asuyissa. Suṇe suṇeyya,
analyzed: assosiṃsu asuyittha asuṇissa tena asuyissa suṇe suṇeyya

original: suṇeyyaṃ. Tena sūye sūyeyya. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Sūyatu, sūyantu iccādi.
analyzed: suṇeyyam tena sūye sūyeyya suṇātu suṇantu sūyatu sūyantu iccādi

original: Gi=sadde, giṇoti. Giṇanti. Tvaṃ giṇosi. Giṇissati, giṇissanti. Agiṇissa. Giṇeyya. Giṇotu iccādi. Vu=saṃvaraṇe, āvuṇoti, āvuṇanti. Āvuṇosi iccādi. Sesesupi yojetabbaṃ. (Svādinayo).
analyzed: gi sadde giṇoti giṇanti tvam giṇosi giṇissati giṇissanti a giṇissa giṇeyya giṇotu iccādi vu saṃvaraṇe āvuṇoti āvuṇanti āvuṇosi iccādi sesesu pi yojetabbam su ādinayo

original: Tana=vitthāre,
analyzed: tana vitthāre

original: 26. Tanāditvo
analyzed: tan ā t itvaḥ

original: Tanādito kattari lavisaye o hoti. Kittiṃ tanoti, tanonti iccādi.
analyzed: tan ādeḥ kattari la visaye o hoti kittim tanoti tanonti icca ādi

original: 76. Ovikaraṇassu paracchakke
analyzed: o vikaraṇassu paracchakke

original: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakkavisaye. Tanute, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanvamhe. Kamme –
analyzed: ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakka visaye tanute tanvante tanuse tanuvhe tanve tanvamhe kamme

original: 5,138. Tanassā vā
analyzed: tanassā vā

original: Tanassa vā ā hoti kye. Papubbo, patāyati. Pataññati, patāyare patāyanti pataññare
analyzed: tanassa vā ā hoti kye papubbaḥ patāyati pataññati patāyare patāyanti pataññare

original: pataññanti+ccādi. Tathā vikaraṇalope iñāgame ca tanissati, tanissanti. Patāyissati.
analyzed: tathā vikaraṇa lope iñ āgame ca tanissati tanissanti patāyissati

original: Atani, ataniṃsu. Atanissa. Patāyissa. Taneyya, taneyyuṃ. Tanotu, tanontu iccādi.
analyzed: atani ataniṃsu atanissa patāyissa taneyya taneyyum tanotu tanontu iccādi

original: Kara=karaṇe,
analyzed: kara karaṇe

original: 5,177. Karassa sossa kubba+kuru+kayirā
analyzed: karassa sossa kubba kuru kayirā

original: Karassa sa okārassa kubbādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Kubbati, kubbanti. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha.
analyzed: karassa saḥ okārassa kubba ādayaḥ vā honti nta māna ti ādīsu kubbati kubbanti karoti karonti karosi karotha

original: 23. Karassa sossa kuṃ
analyzed: karassa sossa kum

original: Karassa sa okārassa kuṃ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi karomi. Kumma karoma. Paracchakke kurute
analyzed: karassa saḥ okārassa kum vā hoti kummi karomi kumma karoma parat śakke kurute

original: kubbate, kubbante iccādi. Kayirati, kayiranti iccādi. Kamme-kyassa dvitte īssa rasso,
analyzed: kubbate kubbante iccādi kayirati kayiranti iccādi kamma ikyassa dvitte īssa rassaḥ

original: kariyyati, karīyati vā iccādi. “Tavaggavaraṇā” dinā ye rassa yakāre kayyati, kayyanti.
analyzed: vā iti ādi ta vagga varaṇāḥ dinā ye rassa yakāre

original: Bahulādhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayirādese tena kayirati, kayiranti iccādi. Bhavissatimhi –
analyzed: bahula adhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayira ādese tena kayiranti icca ādi bhavissatimhi

original: 25. Hāssa cā+haṅa ssena
analyzed: hāssa ca ahaṅaḥ ssena

original: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati, kāhanti iccādi. Iñāgame kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Āhaṅādesābhāvapakkhe karissati, karissanti iccādi. Ajjatane –
analyzed: karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha kāhati kāhanti iccādi iñ āgame kāhati kāhanti iccādi āhaṅa ādesa abhāva pakkhe karissati karissanti iccādi ajjatane

original: 24. Kā īādīsu
analyzed: kā ī ādīsu

original: Karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu.
analyzed: karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā ī ādīsu

original: 44. Dīghā īssa
analyzed: dīghāḥ īs sa

original: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi. Īlope akā, akaṃsu. Ossa siādese akāsi. Siñāgame
analyzed: dīghataḥ parassa ī ssa si vā hoti akāsi ī lope akā akaṃsu ossa si ādese akāsi siñ āgame

original: akāsittha. Akāsi, akāsiṃ, akāsimha. Aññatra akarikari, akariṃsu kariṃsu akaṃsu iccādi.

original: 125. Samānā ro rī+rikkha+kesu
analyzed: samānāḥ raḥ rīrikkhakesu

original: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rī+rikkha+kesūti pakkhe dassa rādese sarī, sarikkho, sariso.
analyzed: samāna saddataḥ parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīrikkhakesu iti pakkhe dassa ra ādese sarī sarikkhaḥ sarisaḥ

original: 3,86. Sabbādīna+mā
analyzed: sap ba ādīn amā

original: Rī+rikkha+kesu sabbādīna+mā hoti. Añño viya dissatīti aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu sabba ādīnamā hoti aññaḥ viya dissati iti añña ādī añña ādikkhaḥ añña ādiso

original: 3,87. Nta+ki+mi+mānaṃ ṭā+kī+ṭī
analyzed: nta kim imānam ṭākīṭī

original: Rī+rikkha+kesu nta+kiṃ+imasaddānaṃ ṭā+kī+ṭī honti yathākkamaṃ. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu nta kiṃima saddānam ṭā kīṭī honti yathākkamam ṭakārā sabba ādesa atthā

original: Bhavādī bhavādikkho bhavādiso, kīdī kīdikkho kīdiso, ayamiva dissatīti īdī īdikkho
analyzed: bhavādī bhavādikkhaḥ bhavādisaḥ kīdī kīdikkhaḥ kīdisaḥ ayam iva dissati iti īdī īdikkhaḥ

original: īdiso. Ākāre yādī yādikkho yādiso, tyādī tyādikkho tyādiso iccādi.
analyzed: īdisaḥ ākāre yādī yādikkhaḥ yādisaḥ tyādī tyādikkhaḥ tyādisaḥ iccādi

original: 3,88. Tumhāmhānaṃ tāme+kasmiṃ
analyzed: tumha amhānam tām ekasmin

original: Rī+rikkha+kesu tumhāmhānaṃ tāmā honte+kasmiṃ yathākkamaṃ. Tvaṃ viya dissati, ayaṃ viya dissatīti tādī mādī iccādi. Ekasminti kiṃ, tumhādiso amhādiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu tumha amhānam tāmāḥ honti ekasmin yathākkamam tvam viya dissati ayam viya dissati iti tādī mādī iccādi ekasmin ti kim tumhādisaḥ amhādisaḥ

original: 3,89. Taṃ+ma+maññatra
analyzed: taṃ mama aññatra

original: Rīrikkhakantato+ññasmiṃ uttarapade tumhāmhāna+mekasmiṃ taṃ+maṃ honti yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: uttara pade tumha amhānam ekasmin taṃ mam honti yathākkamam

original: Tvaṃ dīpo esaṃ, ahaṃ dīpo esaṃti aññapadatthe taṃdīpā maṃdīpā. Tvaṃ saraṇa+mesaṃ,
analyzed: tvam dīpaḥ esam aham dīpaḥ esam ti añña padatthe taṃdīpā maṃdīpā tvam saraṇam esam

original: ahaṃ saraṇa+ mesanti taṃsaraṇā maṃsaraṇā. Tayā yogo tayyogo, mayā yogo mayyogoti
analyzed: aham tayyogo tayyogo mayyogo uti

original: amādisamāse niggahītalopo.
analyzed: am ādi samāse niggahīta lopaḥ

original: 3,90. Ve+tasse+ṭa
analyzed: vā itas seṭa

original: Rī+rikkha+kesu etassa eṭa vā hoti. Edī etādī, edikkho etādikkho, ediso etādiso.
analyzed: rīrikkhakesu etassa vā hoti edī etādī edikkhaḥ etādikkhaḥ edisaḥ etādisaḥ

original: 44. Bhāvakārake sva+ghaṇa gha kā
analyzed: bhāva kārake sva gha ṇa gha kā

original: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṃ.
analyzed: bhāve kārake ca kriyatthāḥ a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulam

original: Apaccayo-paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho, evaṃ niggaho, dhammaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo, evaṃ vinayadharo.
analyzed: a paccaya upaggaṇhanam paggahaḥ evam niggahaḥ dhammam dhāreti iti dhamma dharaḥ evam vinaya dharaḥ

original: Tathā taṃ karotīti takkaro, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ hitakaro, divasakaro, dinakaro, divākaro,
analyzed: tathā tam karoti iti takkaraḥ evam hita karaḥ divasa karaḥ dina karaḥ divākaraḥ

original: nisākaro, dhanuṃ gaṇhīti dhanuggaho. Evaṃ kavacaggaho. Dada=dāne, sabbakāmaṃ dadātīti
analyzed: nisākaraḥ dhanum gaṇhi iti dhanuggahaḥ evam kavacaggahaḥ dadadāne sabba kāmam dadāti iti

original: sabbakāmadado, sabbadado. Āto “parokkhāyañcā”ti caggahaṇena dvitte “rasso pubbassā”ti
analyzed: sabba kāma dadaḥ sabba dadaḥ ā taḥ parokkha āyam ca ati ca ggahaṇena dvitte rassaḥ pubbassa ati

original: rasse ca annaṃ dadātīti annadado, evaṃ dhanado. Saṃpubbo dhā=dhāraṇe, sabbaṃ sandhahatīti
analyzed: rasse ca annam dadāti iti anna dadaḥ evam dhana daḥ saṃpubbaḥ dha ādhāraṇe sabbam sandhahati iti

original: sabbasandho. Nī=pāpane, vipubbo, vinesi vineti vinessati etena etthāti vā vinayo,
analyzed: sabba sandhaḥ nī pāpane vipubbaḥ vinesi vineti vinessati etena ettha ati vā vinayaḥ

original: e+ayādesā. Nayanaṃ nayo. Si=sevāyaṃ, nipubbo, nissīyatīti nissayo. Si=saye, anusayi
analyzed: e a y ādesāḥ nayanam nayaḥ siseva ayam nipubbaḥ nissīyati iti nissayaḥ si saye anusayi

original: anuseti anusessatīti anusayo. I=gatimhi, patipubbo, paṭicca etasmā phala+metīti paccayo.
analyzed: anuseti anusessati iti anusayaḥ i k atimhi pati pubbaḥ paṭicca etasmā phalam eti iti paccayaḥ

original: Saṃ+upubbo, dāgame samudayo. Ci=caye, vinicchayate+nena vinicchayanaṃ vā vinicchayo,
analyzed: saṃupubbaḥ da āgame samudayaḥ cicaye vinicchaya tenena vinicchayanam vā vinicchayaḥ

original: “nito cissa cho”ti cissa cho. Uccayanaṃ uccayo, saṃcayo. Khi=khaye, khayanaṃ khayo.
analyzed: n itaḥ cissa choti cissa cho uccayanam uccayaḥ saṃcayaḥ khi khaye khayanam khayaḥ

original: Ji=jaye, vijayanaṃ vijayo, jayo. Kī=dabbavinīmaye, vikkayanaṃ vikkayo, kayo. Lī=silesane,
analyzed: jijaye vijayanam vijayaḥ jayaḥ vikkayanam vikkayaḥ kayaḥ līsi lesane

original: allīyanti etthāti ālayo, layo. (Ivaṇṇantā).
analyzed: allīyanti ettha iti ālayaḥ layaḥ i vaṇṇa ntā

original: Āsuṇantīti assavā, āssa rasso. Paṭissavanaṃ paṭissavo. Su=passavane, ābhavaggā savantīti
analyzed: āsuṇanti iti assavāḥ āssa rassaḥ paṭissavanam paṭissavaḥ supassavane ābha vaggā savanti iti

original: āsavā. Ru=saddo ravatīti ravo. Bhavatīti bhavo. Pabhavati etasmāti pabhavo. Lū=chedane,
analyzed: āsavāḥ rusaddaḥ ravati iti ravaḥ bhavati iti bhavaḥ pabhavati etasmā ati pabhavaḥ lū chedane

original: lavanaṃ lavo. (Uvaṇṇantā).
analyzed: lavanam lavaḥ uvaṇṇantā

original: Cara=caraṇe, saṃcaraṇaṃ saṃcaro. Dara=vidāraṇe, ādaranaṃ ādaro. Āgacchati āgamanaṃti
analyzed: cara caraṇe saṃcaraṇam saṃcaraḥ dara vidāraṇe ādaranam ādaraḥ āgacchati

original: vā āgamo. Sappa=gamane, sappatīti sappo. Dibbatīti devo. Pakkamanaṃ pakkamatīti vā
analyzed: vā āgamaḥ sappa gamane sappati iti sappaḥ dibbati iti devaḥ pakkamanam pakkamati iti vā

original: pakkamo, evaṃ vikkamo. Cara=caraṇe, vanaṃ caratīti vanacaro. Kāmo avacarati etthāti
analyzed: pakkamaḥ evam vikkamaḥ cara caraṇe vanam carati iti vana caraḥ kāmaḥ avacarati ettha ati

original: kāmāvacaro loko, kāmāvacarā paññā, kāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro.
analyzed: kāma avacaraḥ loko kāma avacarā paññā kāma avacaram cittam gāvaḥ caranti ettha ati gocaro

original: Pādena pivatīti pādapo. Evaṃ kacchapo. Sirasmiṃ ruhatīti siroruho, manādittā o. Guhāyaṃ
analyzed: pādena pivati iti pādapaḥ evam kacchapaḥ sirasmim ruhati iti siroruhaḥ guhā ayam

original: sayatīti guhāsayaṃ cittaṃ, evaṃ kucchisayā vātā. Pabbate tiṭṭhatīti pabbataṭṭho puriso,
analyzed: sayati iti guhā sayam cittam evam kucchi sayā vātā pabbate tiṭṭhati iti pabbata ṭṭho puriso

original: pabbataṭṭhā nadī, pabbataṭṭhaṃ bhasmaṃ. Evaṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ jalaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: pabbata ṭṭhā nadī pabbata ṭṭham bhasmam evam thala ṭṭham jala ṭṭham

original: Kicchatthe dumhi akicchatthe su+īsaṃ+sukha upapadesu-dukkhena karīyati karaṇaṃ vā
analyzed: kicchatthe dumhi a kicchatthe upapade su dukkhena karīyati karaṇam vā

original: dukkaraṃ. Evaṃ dussayo, dukkhena bharīyatīti dubbharo mahiccho. Evaṃ durakkhaṃ cittaṃ,
analyzed: dukkaram evam dussayaḥ dukkhena bharīyati iti dubbharaḥ mahicchaḥ evam durakkham cittam

original: duddaso dhammo, duranubodho dhammo. Īsaṃ sayatīti īsaṃsayo, evaṃ sukhasayo. Īsaṃ
analyzed: duddasaḥ dhammaḥ duranubodhaḥ dhammaḥ īsam sayati iti īsaṃsayaḥ evam sukha sayaḥ īsam

original: karīyatīti īsakkaraṃ kammaṃ. Sukhena karīyatīti sukaraṃ pāpaṃ bālena. Evaṃ subharo
analyzed: karīyati iti īsakkaram kammam sukhena karīyati iti sukaram pāpam bālena evam subharaḥ

original: appiccho, sudassaṃ paravajjaṃ, subodha+miccādi. Sabbattha pādiamādisamāsā.
analyzed: appicchaḥ sudassam paravajjam subodham iccādi sabbattha pādiama ādi samāsā

original: Ghaṇa-bhavatīti bhāvo, o+āvādesā. Aya=iti daṇḍakadhātu, ayati itoti āyo, āharatīti
analyzed: daṇḍaka dhātu āharati iti

original: āhāro. Upahanatīti upaghāto, “hanassa ghāto ṇānubandhe”ti ghātādeso. Rañjatīti rāgo,
analyzed: āhāraḥ upahanati iti upaghātaḥ hanassa ghātaḥ ghāta ghāta ādesaḥ rañjati iti rāgaḥ

original: “kagā cajānaṃ ghānubandhe”ti jassa go. Rañjanti anenāti rāgo. “Assā ṇānubandhe”ti
analyzed: kagā gha anubandha iti jassa go rañjanti anena ati rāgaḥ

original: ā, pajjate+nenāti pādo. Tuda=byathane, patujjate+nenāti patodo. Jarīyati anenāti
analyzed: ā pajja tenena ati pādaḥ tuda byathane patujja tenena ati patodaḥ jarīyati anena ati

original: jāro, evaṃ dāro. Bhajīyatīti bhāgo. Evaṃ bhāro. Labbhatīti lābho. Vi+opubbo, voharīyatīti
analyzed: jāraḥ evam dāraḥ bhajīyati iti bhāgaḥ evam bhāraḥ labbhati iti lābhaḥ viopubbaḥ voharīyati iti

original: vohāro. Diyyatīti dāyo, yuka. Vihaññati etasmāti vighāto. Viharanti etthāti vihāro.
analyzed: vohāraḥ diyyati iti dāyaḥ vihaññati etasmā ati vighātaḥ viharanti ettha ati vihāro

original: Āramanti etasminti ārāmo. Pacanaṃ vā pāko, cassa ko. Cajanaṃ cāgo. Yajanaṃ yāgo. Rajanaṃ rāgo.
analyzed: āramanti etasmin ti ārāmaḥ pacanam vā cajanam cāgaḥ yajanam yāgaḥ rajanam rāgaḥ

original: 127. Ana+ghaṇasvā+parīhi ḷo
analyzed: ana gha ṇa sva a parīhi ḷaḥ

original: Ā+parīhi parassa dahassa ḷo hota+na+ghaṇasu. Paridahanaṃ pariḷāho. Evaṃ dāho. Bhañjanaṃ
analyzed: ā parīhi parassa dahassa ḷaḥ hotana ghaṇasu paridahanam pariḷāhaḥ evam dāhaḥ bhañjanam

original: saṅgo. Evaṃ saṅgo. Saṃkharanaṃ saṃkhāro, “karotissa kho”ti kassa kho. Evaṃ parikkhāro.
analyzed: saṅgaḥ evam saṅgaḥ saṃkharanam saṃkhāraḥ karotissa kho ti kassa kho evam parikkhāro

original: “Purasmā”ti karassa kho, purekkhāro, ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā. Evaṃ upakāro, gāho.
analyzed: karassa kho purekkhāraḥ evam upakāraḥ gāho

original: Gha-vacatīti vako. Sica=paggharaṇe, secanaṃ seko. Evaṃ soko, eovuddhiyo. Yuñjanaṃ yogo.
analyzed: sica paggharaṇe secanam sekaḥ evam sokaḥ yuñjanam yogo

original: Ka-pī=tappane, pīnetīti pīyo, kānubandhattā na vuddhi, “yuvaṇṇāna+miyaṅuvaṅa sare”ti
analyzed: kapī tappane na sara iti

original: iyaṅa. Khipa=peraṇe, khipatīti khipo. Bhuñjantya+nenāti bhujo. Yudha=sampahāre āyujjhanti anenāti āyudhaṃ.
analyzed: khipa peraṇe khipati iti khipaḥ bhuñjanti anena ati bhujaḥ yudha sampahāre āyujjhanti anena ati āyudham

original: 45. Dādhātvi
analyzed: dādhātvi

original: Dādhāto bahula+mi hoti bhāvakārakesu. Dā=dāne, ādiyatītiādi. Evaṃ upādi. Dhā=dhāraṇe,
analyzed: dā dhātoḥ bahulami bhāva kārakesu dā dāne evam upādi dhā dhāraṇe

original: udakaṃ dadhātīti udadhi, “saññāya+mudo+dakassā”ti udakassa udādeso. Jalaṃ dhiyate
analyzed: udakam dadhāti iti udadhi uda ādesaḥ jalam dhiyate

original: asminti jaladhi. Vālāni dhīyanti asminti vāladhi. Sandhīyati sandhātīti vā sandhi.
analyzed: asmin ti jaladhi vālāni dhīyanti asmin ti vāladhi sandhīyati sandhāti iti vā sandhi

original: Dhīyatīti dhi. Vidhīyati vidhāti vidhānaṃ vā vidhi. Sammā samaṃ vā cittaṃ ādadhātīti samādhi.
analyzed: dhīyati iti dhi vidhīyati vidhāti vidhānam vā vidhi sammā samam vā cittam ādadhāti iti samādhi

original: 46. Vamādīhya+thu
analyzed: vama ādīhi athu

original: Vamādīhi bhāvakārakesva+thu hoti. Vama=uggiraṇe, vamanaṃ vamīyatīti vā vamathu. Vepa+kampa=calane, vepanaṃ vepathu.
analyzed: vama ādīhi bhāva kāra kesvathu vama auggiraṇe vamanam vamīyati iti vā vamathu vepa kampa calane vepanam vepathu

original: 47. Kvi
analyzed: kvi

original: Kriyatthā kvi hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakārakesu. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho.
analyzed: kriyatthā kvi hoti bahulam bhāva kārakesu kakāraḥ ka anubandha kāriyattho

original: 159. Kvissa
analyzed: kvissa

original: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti. Sambhavatīti sambhū. Evaṃ vibhavatīti vibhū,
analyzed: kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopaḥ hoti sambhavati iti sambhū evam vibhavati iti vibhū

original: abhibhū, sayambhū. Tathā dhu=kampane, sandhunātīti sandhu. Vibhātīti vibhā. Pabhātīti
analyzed: abhibhū sayambhū tathā dhu kampane sandhunāti iti sandhu vibhāti iti vibhā pabhāti iti

original: pabhā. Saṃgamma bhāsanti etthāti sabhā, “kvimhi lopo+ntabyañjanassā”ti antabyañjanassa
analyzed: pabhā saṃgamma bhāsanti ettha ati sabhā kvimhi lopaḥ u nta byañjanassa ati anta byañjanassa

original: lopo. Bhujena gacchatīti bhujago. Evaṃ urago. Turaṃ=sīghaṃ gacchatīti turaṅgo. Khena
analyzed: lopaḥ bhujena gacchati iti bhujagaḥ evam uragaḥ turaṃsīgham gacchati iti turaṅgaḥ khena

original: gacchatīti khago. Vihāyase gacchatīti vihago, tadaminādipāṭhā vihādeso. Na gacchatīti
analyzed: gacchati iti khagaḥ vihāyase gacchati iti na gacchati iti

original: nago. Evaṃ ago, “nago vā+ppāṇinī”ti vikappena nañasamāse ṭādesanisedho. Jana=janane,
analyzed: nagaḥ evam agaḥ nagaḥ vāppāṇinī iti vikappena naña samāse ṭa ādesa nisedhaḥ jana janane

original: kammato jātoti kammajo, amādisamāso, kammajo vipāko, kammajā paṭisandhi, kammajaṃ
analyzed: kammataḥ jātaḥ iti kamma jaḥ ama ādi samāso kamma jaḥ vipāko kamma jā paṭisandhi kamma jam

original: rūpaṃ. Evaṃ cittajaṃ, utujaṃ, āhārajaṃ. Attajo putto, vārimhi jāto vārijo. Evaṃ thalajo.
analyzed: rūpam evam citta jam utu jam āhāra jam atta jaḥ puttaḥ vārimhi jātaḥ vāri jaḥ evam thala jo

original: Paṅkajaṃ. Jalajaṃ. Aṇḍajaṃ. Sarasijaṃ, upapadasamāse bahulaṃvidhānā vibhatyalope
analyzed: paṅkajam jala jam aṇḍa jam sarasijam upapada samāse bahulam vidhānā

original: “manādīhī”tiādinā siādeso. Dvikkhattuṃ jāto dvijo, “tadaminā” dinā kkhattuṃlopo.
analyzed: mana ādīhi iti ādinā si ādesaḥ dvi kkhattum jātaḥ dvijaḥ tad aminā dinā kkhattuṃlopaḥ

original: Pacchā jāto anujo. Sañjānātīti saññā. Pajānātīti paññā. Evaṃ patiṭṭhātīti patiṭṭhā.
analyzed: pacchā jātaḥ anujaḥ sañjānāti iti saññā pajānāti iti paññā evam patiṭṭhāti iti patiṭṭhā

original: Jhā=cintāyaṃ, parasampattiṃ abhijjhāyatīti abhijjhā. Hitesitaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā jhāyatīti
analyzed: jhā cintā ayam para sampattim abhijjhāyati iti abhijjhā hita isitam upaṭṭhāpetvā jhāyati iti

original: upajjhā. So eva upajjhāyo, “sakatthe”ti yo. Sammā jhāyanti etthāti saṃjhā. Kvidantā
analyzed: upajjhā saḥ eva upajjhāyaḥ sakatthā iti yaḥ sammā jhāyanti ettha ati saṃjhā

original: dhātvatthaṃ na jahanti, liṅgatthaṃ paṭipādayanti.
analyzed: dhātvattham na jahanti liṅga ttham paṭipādayanti

original: 48. Ano
analyzed: ano

original: Kriyatthā bhāvakārakesu ano hoti. Nanda=samiddhiyaṃ, bhāve-nandiyate nandanaṃ. Kamme-anandīyittha
analyzed: kriyatthāḥ bhāva kārakesu anaḥ hoti nanda samiddhiyam bhāvenandiyate nandanam kammenandīyittha

original: nandīyati nandīyissati nanditabbanti vā nandanaṃ vanaṃ. Gahanaṃ gahanīyaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: nandīyati nandīyissati nanditabbanti vā nandanam vanam gahanam gahanīyam vā gahaṇam

original: “tathanarā” dinā nassa ṇo. Gaṇhanaṃ, niggahītassa no. Caritabbaṃ caraṇaṃ. Bhuyate
analyzed: tatha narāḥ dinā nassa no gaṇhanam niggahītassa no caritabbam caraṇam bhuyate

original: bhavanaṃ. Huyate havanaṃ. Rundhitabbaṃ rundhanaṃ rodhanaṃ vā. Bhuñjitabbaṃ bhuñjanaṃ
analyzed: bhavanam huyate havanam rundhitabbam rundhanam rodhanam vā bhuñjitabbam bhuñjanam

original: bhojanaṃ vā. Bujjhitabbaṃ bujjhanaṃ, “padādīnaṃ kvacī”ti yuka. Bodhanaṃ vā. Suti
analyzed: bhojanam vā bujjhitabbam bujjhanam pada ādīnam kvaci iti yuka bodhanam vā suti

original: suyyati vā savanaṃ. Pāpīyatīti pāpuṇanaṃ, “sakāpānaṃ kuka+kū”ti yogavibhāgā kuāgame
analyzed: vā savanam pāpīyati iti pāpuṇanam yogavibhāgā ku āgame

original: nāgame ca tassa ṇo ca. Pālīyatīti pālanaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: na āgame ca tassa ṇo ca pālīyati iti pālanam iccādi

original: Kattari-rajaṃ haratīti rajoharaṇaṃ toyaṃ. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Ghā=gandhopādāne,
analyzed: kattari rajam harati iti rajaḥ haraṇam toyam vijānāti iti viññāṇam gha a gandha upādāne

analyzed: vā tathā vā bhāvanam vā bhāvanam evam pācanam iccādi

original: parīhi ḷo”ti ḷo, āḷāhanaṃ.

analyzed: adhikaraṇe tiṭṭhati asinti ṭhānam evam sayanam senam vā āsanam adhikarīyati ettha ati adhikaraṇam

original: kodhano, kopano. Maṇḍa=bhusane, maṇḍeti sīlenāti maṇḍano. Evaṃ bhūsano. “Aññātrapī”ti okāranisedho.

original: Ṇa-karaṇaṃ kārā, “assā ṇānubandhe”ti ā hoti, eva+muparipi. Haraṇaṃ hārā muttāvali. Taraṇaṃ tārā, dharaṇaṃ dhārā. Araṇaṃ ārā.

original: Yathākathañci saddamhi, ruḷhiyā atthanicchayo.
analyzed: yathā kathañci saddamhi attha nicchayo

analyzed: savanam suti nayanam nayati

original: etāyāti vā nīti. Maññatīti mati, “gamādirānaṃ lopontabyañjanassā”ti gamādittā nalopo.

original: Gamanaṃ gantabbāti vā gati. Upahananaṃ upahati. Ramanti etāya ramanaṃ vā rati. Tananaṃ

analyzed: anapayojake kāriya dhātutaḥ kattum payojanam kāraṇam ekāra nisedhaḥ nassa ṇo ca evam

analyzed: bhaṅgura bhidura bhāsura bhassarā

original: 57. Kattari cā+rambhe
analyzed: kattari ca ārambhe

original: Kriyārambhe kattarikto hoti yathāpattañca, pakarīti pakato bhavaṃ kaṭaṃ. Pakarīyitthāti pakato kaṭo bhavatā. Pasupīti pasutto bhavaṃ. Pasupīyitthāti pasuttaṃ bhavatā, pararūpaṃ.

analyzed: gamana attha akammaka ādhāre ca
